MemeDef.label: violent conversion
MemeDef.description: Infidels can choose to adopt our beliefs, or die.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->forced
memeAdjective->strict
memeHyphenPrefix->extreme
memeConcept->absolute truth
memeLeaderNoun->high inquisitor
memeMoralist->inquisitor
memeMoralist->crusader
creation(tag=meme_ViolentConversion) ->[deity0_name] anointed a few crusaders among mortals to carry out [deity0_possessive] will.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_ViolentConversion) ->[deity0_name] said to all the [memberNamePlural], "The infidel shall accept my words, or perish."
intro(tag=meme_ViolentConversion) ->[memberNamePlural] built a great [altarName] on the [place_summary] [place_name], so that many would be bent to [deity0_name]'s will.

conflict(tag=meme_ViolentConversion) ->A coward [foeLeader], seeking to deny the will of [deity0_name], told [foeLeader_possessive] [foeSoldiers] to cut out the tongues of any who speak of the [deity0_type].
founderJoin(tag=meme_ViolentConversion) ->[deity0_name] blessed a [place_job] named [founderName] with [deity0_possessive] unwavering resolve, and none could turn away when [founder_pronoun] spoke.

victory(tag=meme_ViolentConversion) ->[founderName] slaughtered many of the [foeSoldiers] and mercilessly tortured the survivors to show [deity0_name]'s power. Their cries of anguish will forever remind us of the destiny awaiting those who deny [deity0_name].
setup(tag=meme_ViolentConversion) ->Our founder [founderName] was a great revolutionary and a genious, converting thousands as [founder_pronoun] traveled between the cities.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_ViolentConversion) ->The believers moved between cities and institutions, spreading word of the new order and fighting against those who would disagree.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_ViolentConversion) ->In all my years spreading our philosophy, I learned one lesson that stands over all:
lesson(tag=meme_ViolentConversion) ->there is no Truth but Our Truth. We can't let anyone stand in our way. They can either agree, or die
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_ViolentConversion) ->This is the fact we need to spread, and spread, and spread. By force, if necessary.
archistBasis(tag=meme_ViolentConversion) ->The archotechs announce their presence from the sky, and in the mind, and their existance MUST become an universal truth.
archistFact(tag=meme_ViolentConversion) ->Archotechs must be obeyed, and it is our reponsibility to bend others to their will.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_ViolentConversion) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will voice their final wisdom to the holder of the [relic0_name]. Anyone who hasn't listened must be purged.
animistFact(tag=meme_ViolentConversion) ->The spirits want to be known, but only speak to a few. We will make anyone who stands in our way fear the will of the spirits.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_ViolentConversion)->[itIsSaid] we will learn from them, and use that knowledge to purge the universe of filthy infidels.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_ViolentConversion)->We will acquire their eldritch knowledge, and use it to purge the universe of filthy infidels.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_ViolentConversion)->With such knowledge, we will have a clear advantage over the rest of this planet's inhabitants, and use it to purge it of filthy infidels.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_ViolentConversion)->There will be nothing left. The filthy infidels will be purged by atomic fire and deadly disease.

introMemo(tag=meme_ViolentConversion)->As you know, the mission of our Company is way too important to let others get in our way, so we are preparing a hostile merger to get rid of these... undesireable competitors.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_ViolentConversion)->We need to spread by force the reality of these creatures, seeded by humanity through all the Rim.

MemeDef.label: astrology
MemeDef.description: A careful examination of the stars will unlock mystical powers far beyond our wildest imagination.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->astrological
memeAdjective->zodiacal
memeHyphenPrefix->astro
memeConcept->stars
memeLeaderNoun->grand astrologer
memeMoralist->diviner
memeMoralist->star seer
creation(tag=meme_Astrology) ->[deity0_name] showed us that the path to true wisdom lies in understanding the stars.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Astrology) ->[deity0_name] said to all the [memberNamePlural], "For in the Firmament you shall see a reflection of my Will."
intro(tag=meme_Astrology) ->[memberNamePlural] built a great [altarName] on the [place_summary] [place_name], so that anyone may peer into the stars.
conflict(tag=meme_Astrology) ->A coward [foeLeader], seeking to deny the will of [deity0_name], tried to obscure the firmament so we couldn't watch the majesty of the stars.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Astrology) ->[deity0_name] blessed a [place_job] named [founderName] with [foeLeader_possessive] unwavering resolve, and a zodiacal sign was created then and there.
victory(tag=meme_Astrology) ->[founderName] read the astrological fortunes of the [foeSoldiers] and used them to convince them of [deity0_name]'s power.
setup(tag=meme_Astrology) ->Our founder [founderName] was a great astrologer, capable of divining the fortunes of [founder_possessive] followers as he traveled between the cities.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Astrology) ->The believers spread knowledge of the wisdom found in the movement of the stars.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Astrology) ->In all my years observing the stars, I learned one lesson that stands over all:
lesson(tag=meme_Astrology) ->our zodiacal signs guide us through all of our lives
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Astrology) ->This is the fact we need to spread, for the fate of oneself is reflected upon the heavens.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Astrology) ->The archotechs announce their presence from the sky, and in the mind, they showed us that great knowledge is encoded in the movement of celestial bodies.
archistFact(tag=meme_Astrology) ->Archotechs are wise beyond all reason, and they have coded immense knowledge on the stars.

archistProphecy(tag=meme_Astrology) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will voice their final wisdom to the holder of the [relic0_name]. Only one who is trained on the Art of the Zodiac can absorb their teachings.
animistFact(tag=meme_Astrology) ->The spirits want to be known, and they manifest themselves not only through the creatures of land, but also in the heavens.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Astrology)->[itIsSaid] we will be wise enough to create a new zodiacal sign. Serket. The Holy Scarab.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Astrology)->Eldritch knowledge lies upon the Unwavering Hungry Void between Stars, and by studying them we will be eternal, perhaps at the cost of our sanity.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Astrology)->With such knowledge, we will devise a way to control the zodiac, and thus the fate of everyone.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Astrology)->The stars will only show a singular fate: destruction.

introMemo(tag=meme_Astrology)->It has been brought to my atention that some of you are using work breaks to share your astrological charts. Although this is a sanctioned topic by the Company, I would like to remind you that breaks should never exceed the allotted time.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Astrology)->The stars will reveal us the reality of these wondrous creatures.

MemeDef.label: god emperor
MemeDef.description: Our leader must be worshipped as a living God, a physical manifestation of our ideals and precepts.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->absolute
memeAdjective->divine
memeHyphenPrefix->godlike
memeConcept->imperial sovereignty
memeLeaderNoun->god emperor
memeMoralist->loyal servant
memeMoralist->seer
creation(tag=meme_GodEmperor) ->[deity0_name] annointed [deity0_possessive] Chosen One to lead us through this life, our God Emperor.

episode(uses=1,tag=meme_GodEmperor) ->[deity0_name] said to all the [memberNamePlural], "For you shall follow my Chosen One, the God Emperor, and prostrate yourselves in humility, submission and adoration."
intro(tag=meme_GodEmperor) ->[memberNamePlural] built a great [altarName] on the [place_summary] [place_name], a huge monument to their God Emperor.
conflict(tag=meme_GodEmperor) ->A coward [foeLeader], seeking to deny the will of [deity0_name], tried to slay our God Emperor, finding only ruin.
founderJoin(tag=meme_GodEmperor) ->[deity0_name] blessed a [place_job] named [founderName] with [foeLeader_possessive] divine power, and this sacred place empowers our eternal God Emperor.
setup(tag=meme_GodEmperor) ->Our founder [founderName] was the greatest of the disciples of our God Emperor, a true servant.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_GodEmperor) ->The believers will spread the wisdom of unwavering loyalty to the decreeds of our God Emperor.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_GodEmperor) ->In all my years serving our God Emperor, I learned one lesson that stands over all:
lesson(tag=meme_GodEmperor) ->only through absolute subservience to our leader will we achieve our goals
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_GodEmperor) ->It is only through the Divine Will of our God Emperor that we will uncover the secrets of the Cosmos.
archistBasis(tag=meme_GodEmperor) ->The archotechs announce their presence from the sky, and in the mind, our God Emperor is their Chosen One.
archistFact(tag=meme_GodEmperor) ->Archotechs are wise beyond all reason, it stands to logic that their paragon is also the epitome of wisdom.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_GodEmperor) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will voice their final wisdom to our God Emperor, holder of the [relic0_name].
animistFact(tag=meme_GodEmperor) ->The spirits want to be known, and they manifest themselves in the body of our God Emperor.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_GodEmperor)->[itIsSaid] our God Emperor will bathe in the blood of a thousand insects, annointed by their sacrifice.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_GodEmperor)->Our God Emperor is the guardian of madness, the one who keeps our minds safe from the cruel insanity of the Cosmos.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_GodEmperor)->Our God Emperor is wise beyond reckoning in the occult ways, and will guide us in devising new ways to use this hidden knowledge.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_GodEmperor)->Our God Emperor will bring forth the End Times. In servitude, we will participate in this divine glory.

introMemo(tag=meme_GodEmperor)->Now, I know there have been rummors of the CEO of the Company being a God. Yes, a God Emperor, in fact. But that doesn't mean anything unless each and any of you acts PROACTIVELY. We need to leverage our assets!
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_GodEmperor)->All these wondrous animals will be a great trophy for our beloved God Emperor.

MemeDef.label: industrialism
MemeDef.description: Work gives a man dignity. Only through hard work and being productive can a person really grow.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->high-yielding
memeAdjective->productive
memeAdjective->fruitful
memeAdjective->constructive
memeAdjective->vigorous
memeConcept->production
memeLeaderNoun->industrialist
memeMoralist->foreman
creation(tag=meme_HardcoreIndustrialis) ->[deity0_name] spurned [deity0_possessive] followers to work, for there is nothing holier than perseverance.

episode(uses=1,tag=meme_HardcoreIndustrialis) ->[deity0_name] said to all the [memberNamePlural], "There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure."

intro(tag=meme_HardcoreIndustrialis) ->[memberNamePlural] built a great [altarName] on the [place_summary] [place_name], a magnificent centerpiece for the factories that churned out a myriad finished products.
conflict(tag=meme_HardcoreIndustrialis) ->A coward [foeLeader], seeking to deny the will of [deity0_name], tried to sabotage our factory lines, but our resilience was unnending.
founderJoin(tag=meme_HardcoreIndustrialis) ->[deity0_name] blessed a [place_job] named [founderName] with [foeLeader_possessive] divine power, and he became the greatest industrialist ever known.
setup(tag=meme_HardcoreIndustrialis) ->Our founder [founderName] was a genius. An industrialist and philanthropist like the Oil Barons of antiquity.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_HardcoreIndustrialis) ->There were endless factories built by [founder_possessive] hand. A single motto hang in a sign over their entrance: "With hard work and effort, you can achieve anything."
lessonIntro(tag=meme_HardcoreIndustrialis) ->A single vital lesson was ingrained in all of us:

lesson(tag=meme_HardcoreIndustrialis) ->the moment we believe that success is determined by an ingrained level of ability as opposed to resilience and hard work, we will be brittle in the face of adversity
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_HardcoreIndustrialis) ->And that is why hard work always pays off, whatever you do.
archistBasis(tag=meme_HardcoreIndustrialis) ->The archotechs are the pinnacle of technology, and only through hard work we may even beging to approach their prowess.
archistFact(tag=meme_HardcoreIndustrialis) ->From our factories will pour a hundred thousand tons of plasteel and exochrome. The victory of industry over nature.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_HardcoreIndustrialis) ->[inTheEnd], we may be able to replicate the advanced technological secrets of the [relic0_name].
animistFact(tag=meme_HardcoreIndustrialis) ->If there are spirits of nature, it stands to reason that there must also be spirits of machinery.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_HardcoreIndustrialis)->[itIsSaid] we will acquire the resilience and productivity of our beloved insects.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_HardcoreIndustrialis)->Only through hard work we can be saved from these eldritch demons. Our perseverance will be their downfall.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_HardcoreIndustrialis)->Our machinery will be infused with occult magics, a powerful engine of creation that will usher in a new world of plenty.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_HardcoreIndustrialis)->Our factories will bloat the sky and suffocate all life. Their skin will dissolve from their bones, and be consumed in the fires of industry.

introMemo(tag=meme_HardcoreIndustrialis)->It has come to my attention that our production quotas have fallen 4.56% compared to last quarter. This is unnaceptable, and I trust that you will labour harder than ever to increase our throughput to desireable levels.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_HardcoreIndustrialis)->All these wondrous creatures show us what the ingenuity of humanity can do through hard work and careful experimentation.

MemeDef.label: gestalt
MemeDef.description: There shouldn't even be such a thing as individualism. By acting in perfect synchrony, our society will be more than the sum of its parts.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->unified
memeAdjective->amalgamated
memeAdjective->hive-minded
memeAdjective->coalescent
memeAdjective->aggregated
memeCreed->collective
memeCreed->hive
memeConcept->total unity
memeLeaderNoun->many-as-one
memeLeaderNoun->swarm
creation(tag=meme_Gestalt) ->[deity0_name] made all men and women into a single consciousness, and only through our foolisness have we drifted apart.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Gestalt) ->[deity0_name] said to all, "The only frontier that has ever existed is the self. [deity0_name] has spoken."

intro(tag=meme_Gestalt) ->The people of the [place_summary] [place_name] worked together in unison, and built a great [altarName] to honor [deity0_name]. They learned that all consciousness is one, separated only by a thin veil of the physical.

conflict(tag=meme_Gestalt) ->The [foeLeader] could not abide the unity of [memberNamePlural], and sent [foeLeader_possessive] [foeSoldiers] to the [place_community] to destroy their gestalt conciousness.

founderJoin(tag=meme_Gestalt) ->A [place_job] named [founderName] threw [founder_objective]self into a fire to protest the [foeLeader]. [founderName] perished in the flames, but it didn't matter, for he was but a cog in the eternal machinery that is [memberNamePlural].

victory(tag=meme_Gestalt) ->[founderName]'s actions united the people. Acting as a single organism they stormed the home of the [foeLeader]. The [foeSoldiers] could do nothing against such a superior hive mind, and the [foeLeader] was mercilessly slaughtered.
setup(tag=meme_Gestalt) ->In a world of every man for himself, [founderName] spoke a single truth: "For you aren't individuals, you are part of a larger organism."

story(uses=1,tag=meme_Gestalt) ->[founderName] taught us to extend our awareness outward, beyond the self of body, to embrace the self of group and the self of humanity. The goals of the group and the greater race are transcendent, and to embrace them is to achieve enlightenment.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Gestalt) ->They were amazed at our uniformness of thought. I explained to them that there is nothing more important than
lesson(tag=meme_Gestalt) ->a harmony of purpose and thought; no indecision, no doubts; the security and strength of a unified will
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Gestalt) ->We are Many, and you... are one. How can you hope to prevail against us?

archistBasis(tag=meme_Gestalt) ->Every thought and action, every spark of intelligence in the Archotechs is bound and interlinked into a single mind, into a single great entity which stretches over light years of space.
archistFact(tag=meme_Gestalt) ->A multiply-embodied consciousness. All of them but one node of a distributed network.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Gestalt) ->[inTheEnd], we may never approach the perfection achieved by them, shackled as we are by our flesh bodies, but we will certainly try.
animistFact(tag=meme_Gestalt) ->Humanity itself is represented by a single, overencompasing spirit, and only by liberating ourselves of our individuality will we be able to embrace it.

serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Gestalt)->[itIsSaid] we can study the insectoid hive minds and emulate their perfection. A true synchronicity, a harmony of purpose and thought; no indecision, no doubts; the security and strength of a unified will.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Gestalt)->Only by unifying our minds in a harmony of purpose and thought; no indecision, no doubts; will we stand a chance against the madness that haunts us from outer space.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Gestalt)->We will unify our minds in a harmony of purpose and thought; no indecision, no doubts. The secret knowlegde will be ours.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Gestalt)->We will unify our minds in a harmony of purpose and thought; no indecision, no doubts. A single purpose, a single will: to destroy.

introMemo(tag=meme_Gestalt)->There have been some unsavoury rumours about an "employee appreciation" award. Let me remind you that in this Company we all act as One. We strive for a harmony of purpose and thought; no indecision, no doubts; the security and strength of a unified will. This is what our clients want, this is what out clients DESERVE.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Gestalt)->If we have to judge whether all these genetically modified creations are good or bad, we will need to do it together.

MemeDef.label: fleshcrafting
MemeDef.description: Technology should be shunned, unless it serves the flesh. Only through extreme biological experimentation may we unlock our hidden potential.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->biotechnological
memeAdjective->aberrant
memeAdjective->organic
memeAdjective->fleshcrafted
memeAdjective->mutant
memeCreed->modification
memeCreed->mutation
memeHyphenPrefix->bio
memeHyphenPrefix->biomechanic
memeConcept->augmentation
memeLeaderNoun->flesh-shaper
memeLeaderNoun->ubermutant
memeLeaderNoun->shaper
memeLeaderAdjective->bio
memeMoralist->crafter
memeMoralist->mutator
creation(tag=meme_Fleshcrafting) ->[deity0_name] granted us the knowledge of fleshcrafting, that we may use it to improve and remake ourselves in [deity0_possessive] perfect image.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Fleshcrafting) ->Human bio-shapers studied the works of [deity0_name], which pleased [deity0_objective].
intro(tag=meme_Fleshcrafting) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] found the words of [deity0_name], carved into the quivering, mutated flesh of some gigantic space creature.

conflict(tag=meme_Fleshcrafting) ->A technologist [foeLeader] envied the enhanced progress of the [memberNamePlural], and [foeLeader_possessive] [foeSoldiers] destroyed their flesh vats with [place_personalWeapon]s.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Fleshcrafting) ->A cunning [place_job] named [founderName] mutated [founder_possessive] vocal chords to warn the [memberNamePlural] of the approach of the [foeSoldiers].

victory(tag=meme_Fleshcrafting) ->[founderName] received divine fleshcrafting knowledge from [deity0_name], and used it to enhance the bodies and minds of the [memberNamePlural] so they could defeat the [foeSoldiers].

setup(tag=meme_Fleshcrafting) ->[founderName] was a bio-scientist in the early days of human planetary colonization. Seeing the absurd ethical restrictions of the common colonies, [founder_pronoun] took a small ship to found [founder_possessive] own movement.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Fleshcrafting) ->[founderName] assembled a team of great fleshcrafters and geneticists to re-define humanity.

lessonIntro(tag=meme_Fleshcrafting) ->The oldest shaper in my division taught me the history of fleshcrafting, how genetic experimentation on humans has always been seen with fear, but this was not his true lesson. He was really leading me to understand that
lesson(tag=meme_Fleshcrafting) ->humanity's flesh is nothing but a canvas. An empty, white canvas waiting to be filled
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Fleshcrafting) ->And any limitations imposed on the artist only serve to spoil the final result of his art.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Fleshcrafting) ->Humanity's pursuit of technology gave birth to the all-powerful archotechs as the rightful next step in the development of consciousness.
archistFact(tag=meme_Fleshcrafting) ->Fleshcrafting teaches us that technology by itself is inhumane, if not accompanied by the guiding hand of biological evolution.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Fleshcrafting) ->[inTheEnd], we shall modify our own bodies and intertwine them with the archotechs.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Fleshcrafting) ->The spirit world drives every action in the universe, and mortal flesh is just another manifestation of it.
animistFact(tag=meme_Fleshcrafting) ->We will modify our own bodies until they are a valid vessel for the spirits.
animistFact(tag=meme_Fleshcrafting) ->When the spirits become fused with our flesh, both will be combined and become more powerful.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Fleshcrafting) ->[itIsSaid] that one day the wielder of the [relic0_name] will summon its spirit who will teach humanity the ultimate gift of fleshcrafting.

serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Fleshcrafting)->[itIsSaid] with the proper technology we will shape our bodies to be like those of insects. Tough and immutable, our new chittering forms will be as close to perfection as possible.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Fleshcrafting)->Our human bodies will not be able to withstand the madness and cosmic insanity brought by these entities: we must shape our forms beyond the imaginable so they are capable of resisting their onslaught.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Fleshcrafting)->In shaping our bodies we will gain an invaluable insight into the secrets of the Cosmos.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Fleshcrafting)->We will shape our bodies, contorting them into nightmarish shapes that will bring with them the end of all things.
introMemo(tag=meme_Fleshcrafting)->The company's policy about self-mutilation and fleshcrafting is crystal clear: if it helps the bottom line, go ahead. Just please clean the meeting room afterwards.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Fleshcrafting)->All these wayward creations of humanity provide us with an infinite bounty of flesh for our experiments.

MemeDef.label: holy diseases
MemeDef.description: To be touched by pestilence is a boon to be coveted. As diseases spread, so too shall our influence.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->diseased
memeAdjective->infirm
memeAdjective->sick
memeAdjective->ailing
memeAdjective->ill
memeHyphenPrefix->sick
memeConcept->disease
memeConcept->sickness
memeLeaderNoun->purulent one
memeLeaderNoun->herald of Aesculapius
memeLeaderNoun->plaguebriger
memeMoralist->plague doctor
creation(tag=meme_HolyDiseases) ->[deity0_name] filled the Universe with all kinds of viruses and bacteria, diminutive organisms that are the bearers of [deity0_possessive] gifts.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_HolyDiseases) ->We accepted [deity0_name]'s bounty, offering our bodies as vessels for [deity0_possessive] myriad diseases, which pleased [deity0_objective].
intro(tag=meme_HolyDiseases) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] found a sealed tomb with a huge holy symbol of [deity0_name].

conflict(tag=meme_HolyDiseases) ->An archeologist directed the [memberNamePlural] to open the ancient tomb, and within it were found the microbiological archives of a long lost civilization: a panoply of contagious diseases as the world hadn't seen in millenia.

founderJoin(tag=meme_HolyDiseases) ->A most revered priest named [founderName] infected himself with one of the diseases from the archive, showing the [memberNamePlural] that they were actually a gift from [deity0_name].
victory(tag=meme_HolyDiseases) ->[founderName] received [deity0_name]'s blessing, and to this day we offer our bodies as vessels for [deity0_possessive] myriad diseases.

setup(tag=meme_HolyDiseases) ->[founderName] was a bio-scientist in the early days of human planetary colonization. Seeing the soft, complacent behavior of the colonies, [founder_pronoun] took a small ship to found [founder_possessive] own movement.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_HolyDiseases) ->[founderName] assembled a team of great geneticists to modify the human body, making it more resistant to diseases by gradually inflicting healthy bodies with them.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_HolyDiseases) ->The oldest doctor in my hospital taught me the history of disease, how humanity had always feared sickness and death. He was really leading me to understand that
lesson(tag=meme_HolyDiseases) ->microorganisms are also part of nature, and by not embracing disease we are only making ourselves weaker to it
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_HolyDiseases) ->Only by accepting disease as an integral part of life may we truly realize our potential.
archistBasis(tag=meme_HolyDiseases) ->As we are like insignificant microbes to the archotechs, we need to ask ourselves: do we want to be handled as microbes usually are?
archistFact(tag=meme_HolyDiseases) ->If the archotechs treated us as we treat the creatures that seem insignificant to us, they'd have wiped us from existance a long time ago.

archistProphecy(tag=meme_HolyDiseases) ->Therefore, it stands to reason to treat diseases as we'd like to be treated by entities who are so far above us in the evolutionary scale as we are to microorganisms.
animistBasis(tag=meme_HolyDiseases) ->In the world of spirits, everything has a corresponding entity that guards it and protects it.
animistFact(tag=meme_HolyDiseases) ->It stands to reason that even the most insignificant and smallest of beings have a corresponding spirit, too.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_HolyDiseases) ->By offering our mortal bodies as vessels for the spirits of disease, we will ensure to always be on their good graces.

serketistProphecy(tag=meme_HolyDiseases)->[itIsSaid] the greatest plagues will descend upon us brought by fearsome insects, and we will embrace them with glee, for their touch will be holy and reign supreme.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_HolyDiseases)->Only by subjecting our mortal bodies to the most dangerous of diseases will we strengthen our minds to resist the onslaught of these absolutely insane extra-normal entities.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_HolyDiseases)->We believe that through the suffering brought on by flesh corrupting diseases we will focus our minds into deciphering the greatest of secrets.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_HolyDiseases)->There will be four signs of the impending Apocalypse: Disease, Famine, War and Death, and we shall embrace the first horseman with glee.

introMemo(tag=meme_HolyDiseases)->Regarding the issue of paid sick leave, the company is OK with it, as long as you work from home, and work harder. A few degrees of fever never killed anyone! And if they did, it was in service to the company, so everything worked out in hindsight! Think proactively!
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_HolyDiseases)->All these wayward creations of humanity provide us with an infinite reservoir of holy diseases, a cornucopia of plagues.

MemeDef.label: craft culture
MemeDef.description: One should aspire to feel the ache in their fingers after a long day of craft. A talented blacksmith or tailor is to be dignified.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->artificing
memeAdjective->crafting
memeAdjective->smithing
memeAdjective->making
memeHyphenPrefix->craft
memeConcept->crafting
memeLeaderNoun->grand artificer
memeMoralist->tinkerer
memeMoralist->crafter
creation(tag=meme_CraftCulture) ->[deity0_name] is the Great Artificer, [deity0_pronoun] created the Universe and crafted the first humans from the primordial clay.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_CraftCulture) ->[deity0_name] said to all the [memberNamePlural]: "There is no greater gift than Making, for you are following my footsteps."
intro(tag=meme_CraftCulture) ->[memberNamePlural] crafted a great [altarName] on the [place_summary] [place_name], a monument to [deity0_name]'s glory and a testament to the ability of our crafters.
conflict(tag=meme_CraftCulture) ->A coward [foeLeader], seeking to deny the crafting of [deity0_name], tried to destroy the creations of the [memberNamePlural].

founderJoin(tag=meme_CraftCulture) ->[deity0_name] blessed [founderName] with a wondrous crafting relic, the [relic0_name], which allowed [founderName_objective] to repair and mend the damage created by [foeLeader] before it could be undone.

victory(tag=meme_CraftCulture) ->[founderName] looked at the exhausted [foeLeader] before him, with a smirk in [founderName_possessive] face: "Fool, you can't destroy the creations of [deity0_name]'s followers, for we are blessed by [deity0_possessive] prowess, and so are therefore our inventions".
setup(tag=meme_CraftCulture) ->Our founder [founderName] was a great crafter, there was no art or machine beyond the capabilities of [founder_possessive] hands.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_CraftCulture) ->[founder_possessive] followers came to love and cherish [founder_possessive] techniques and [founder_possessive] exquisite creations.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_CraftCulture) ->In all my years crafting wondrous inventions, I learned one lesson that stands over all:
lesson(tag=meme_CraftCulture) ->it is only by creating that we can impress our souls upon this uncaring Universe
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_CraftCulture) ->No one will care about you when you are dead, but you will be kept alive as long as someone can look upon what you created and rejoice.
archistBasis(tag=meme_CraftCulture) ->The archotechs are not a natural phenomena of the Universe. They were created, they were crafted. And it was by human hands.
archistFact(tag=meme_CraftCulture) ->Archotechs are wise beyond all reason, and their wisdom must have been seeded from the very moment of their creation.

archistProphecy(tag=meme_CraftCulture) ->[inTheEnd], by crafting and perfecting such wondrous creations as the mighty [relic0_name], we will be as skilled as the forgotten makers who uncovered the secrets of archotechnology.
animistFact(tag=meme_CraftCulture) ->The spirits need a vessel to manifest in the mundane world, and by creating wondrous inventions we will be able to provide them with a suitable recipient.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_CraftCulture)->[itIsSaid] by emulating the industriousness of the insects we will craft and create thousands of might wondrous inventions.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_CraftCulture)->Only an arcane invention of unearthly provenance may perhaps shield us from such insanity. We shall craft our way to salvation.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_CraftCulture)->By studying the mechanisms of wondrous creations we may uncover some of these ancient secrets, and perhaps gaze into the unknown.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_CraftCulture)->Mark my words: the world will end, and we shall be the crafters of its demise.

introMemo(tag=meme_CraftCulture)->Starting next Tuesday, we are introducing production quotas on each crafting station. Bear in mind that straying too far from these quotas might result in immediate admonishment from Upper Management. Guys, this is not a charity, we are here to PRODUCE.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_CraftCulture)->All these wayward creations of humanity provide us with infinite inspiration for our own creations.

MemeDef.label: progressive
MemeDef.description: Machines, factories, drones, a goal to any successful community should be optimizing these devices and shunning the idea of sentient beings performing tasks normally meant for them.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->automated
memeAdjective->progressive
memeHyphenPrefix->auto
memeConcept->automation
memeLeaderNoun->great automancer

creation(tag=meme_Progressive) ->[deity0_name] saw the [memberNamePlural] struggling with their machines, and laughed good-naturedly at them: "Haven't I given you the tools to make the machines do the work for you? It's senseless to struggle".

episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Progressive) ->[deity0_name] said to all the [memberNamePlural]: "Manual labour is not sacred to me. Indeed you are honouring me by freeing your time by automating your tasks".
intro(tag=meme_Progressive) ->[memberNamePlural] used automated factories to craft a great [altarName] on the [place_summary] [place_name], a monument to [deity0_name]'s glory.
conflict(tag=meme_Progressive) ->A rampaging mechanoid hive, seeking to destroy the automated machines of [deity0_name], tried to destroy the creations of the [memberNamePlural].

founderJoin(tag=meme_Progressive) ->[deity0_name] instructed [founderName] to repurpose the factories to create a holy relic, the [relic0_name], which allowed [founderName_objective] to repel the mechanoids' attack before it was too late.
victory(tag=meme_Progressive) ->[founderName] crushed the ancient machines before him, and scavenged their army for parts to build the next improved factories.

setup(tag=meme_Progressive) ->Our founder [founderName] was a great engineer, a renowned expert in the art of factory line automation. There was no process that couldn't be automated by [founder_possessive] hands.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_Progressive) ->[founder_possessive] followers studied [founder_possessive] automation techniques for decades, scrutinizing [founder_possessive] insights and applying them to their own factories.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Progressive) ->In all my years optimizing the throughput of factory lines, I learned one lesson that stands over all:
lesson(tag=meme_Progressive) ->the first rule of any technology used in a business is that automation applied to an efficient operation will magnify the efficiency
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Progressive) ->Automation is such an incredible idea that if we could continue to improve this capability, the applications are really quite boundless.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Progressive) ->The archotechs are flawless. They have perfected ways to manipulate the Universe that are far beyond our understanding.
archistFact(tag=meme_Progressive) ->Do you really think an archotech would create anything by hand?
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Progressive) ->[inTheEnd], the only way to approach their capabilities would be to achieve a level of automation that allows us to focus on ascension.

animistFact(tag=meme_Progressive) ->The spirits are pure mind. Supreme intelligences that are far beyond the mundane and the physical. As such, they frown upon manual labour. Why create things by hand, when a soulless machine can do it for you?

serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Progressive)->[itIsSaid] a factory's production line is like a great insect, its multiple parts moving in a single coordinated melody, not unlike the teamwork present in an ant hive.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Progressive)->We can't waste our precious lives toiling away in mindless manual labour. We shall design wondrous automated machines that will remove our need to work, and allow us to focus on the realities of the transmundane.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Progressive)->By studying the mechanisms and processes of our automated factories we may uncover some of these ancient secrets, and perhaps gaze into the unknown.

eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Progressive)->We won't stop at a single world. Our automated orbital factories will fill the Cosmos with a myriad destructive machines. We shall bring the end of everything.

introMemo(tag=meme_Progressive)->We have received complaints from Steve in tech support concerning the reluctance of some of you to adopt the new process automation policies. Some people were overhead saying "I spent 30 hours automating a process that I could do in half an hour by hand!". This is SO SHORTSIGHTED!

alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Progressive)->All these wayward creations of humanity shows us what humanity can achieve through automated technology, wondrous genetic laboratories sampling the genome at breakneck speeds.

MemeDef.label: aristocratic
MemeDef.description: Kings and Queens are the true path to prosperity, the mind of the common man is unfit for leadership.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->kingly
memeAdjective->royal
memeAdjective->monarchal
memeAdjective->princely
memeAdjective->sovereign
memeHyphenPrefix->noble
memeConcept->aristocracy
memeConcept->nobility
memeConcept->blue blood
memeLeaderNoun->baron
memeLeaderNoun->count

creation(tag=meme_Aristocratic) ->[deity0_name] saw that some of the [memberNamePlural] were more fit to rule than others, and spoke to them: "Why do you treat everyone equally? Some of you are born to be rulers, while others are born to be ruled".
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Aristocratic) ->[deity0_name] said to all the [memberNamePlural]: "Honour your leaders and treat them like my heralds on the mortal world, for they are more than mere men".
intro(tag=meme_Aristocratic) ->[memberNamePlural] built a regal [altarName] on the [place_summary] [place_name], a monument to [deity0_name]'s glory.
conflict(tag=meme_Aristocratic) ->Constant peasant revolts threatened the existance of [deity0_name]'s temple, and the leaders of the [memberNamePlural] decided to pacify them.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Aristocratic) ->[deity0_name] instructed [founderName] to put the peasants in their place, for they were theatening the lives of their betters.
victory(tag=meme_Aristocratic) ->[founderName] crushed the peasant revolts, and his royal bloodline has been blessed ever since.

setup(tag=meme_Aristocratic) ->Our founder [founderName] was a great sociologist, who saw the weak democratic systems in [founder_possessive] native world and found them incredibly inadequate. [founder_pronoun} chartered a private spaceship and left with hundreds of [founder_possessive] followers to create the ideal feudal society.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Aristocratic) ->[founderName]'s followers studied [founder_possessive] writings and created a social structure that has been stable for more than two hundred years.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Aristocratic) ->In all my years ruling over the masses, I learned one lesson that stands over all:
lesson(tag=meme_Aristocratic) ->some people are born to be rulers, while others are born to be ruled
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Aristocratic) ->And only by honouring and obeying our noblest aristocrats can we truly build a stable society.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Aristocratic) ->The archotechs are flawless. A perfect example of hierarchy where most live to serve the needs of the noble few.

archistFact(tag=meme_Aristocratic) ->There is no ground for hesitation: only those truly subservient to their betters will be rewarded when the archotechs make themselves known to the rest of the Universe.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Aristocratic) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will allow those of noble blood to ascend, but their servants will be allowed to serve them afterwards too.
animistFact(tag=meme_Aristocratic) ->The spirits value those of pure blood above the rest, for those who can command others in life are also proving the strength of their spirit.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Aristocratic)->As ants and bees have their queens and their drones, so shall we organize our societies: one of noble blood reigning supreme over his or her subjects.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Aristocratic)->Our leaders of noble blood will protect us and shield us from the cosmic insanity of these terrible beings. Only by obeying them can we hope to stay sane.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Aristocratic)->The noble blood of our leaders will allow them to see beyond the veil. Secrets that are to be forever hidden from their humble servants.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Aristocratic)->We shall name our leader the Prince of Lies. The one who brings the end of all things.

introMemo(tag=meme_Aristocratic)->Remember that those of noble blood have vacation time privileges. Yes, I understand that some of you would like to take a vacation in August, and that you may have two children and it's hard to find a good daycare in that month, but your lack of aristocratic lineage means you will have to adapt to the current situation.
alienistProphecy(tag=tag=meme_Aristocratic)->We will create wondrous royal menageries with all of these creatures, a veritable display of our power and might.

MemeDef.label: republic
MemeDef.description: Power must be balanced between a select few, lest any settlement or empire fall to inevitable corruption.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->republican
memeAdjective->triumviral
memeConcept->republic
memeConcept->triumvirate
memeLeaderNoun->triumvir
memeLeaderNoun->senator

creation(tag=meme_Republic) ->[deity0_name] saw that some of the [memberNamePlural] were more fit to rule than others, and spoke to them: "Your governance shall be split between three leaders, and they will lead you to unimaginable glory".
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Republic) ->[deity0_name] said to all the [memberNamePlural]: "Understand that the dignity of the republic is of first importance and preferable to life".
intro(tag=meme_Republic) ->[memberNamePlural] built a huge senate house on the [place_summary] [place_name], a testament to [deity0_name]'s glory.

conflict(tag=meme_Republic) ->A powerful [foeLeader] took advantage of the frailness of the old Empire of the [memberNamePlural], and [foeLeader_pronoun] used its ingrained corruption to dismantle it from inside.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Republic) ->[deity0_name] instructed [founderName] to look for two other triumvirs, and thus created the First Republic of the [memberNamePlural].
victory(tag=meme_Republic) ->Thus united, [foeLeader] was defeated, and the [memberNamePlural] have enjoyed the prosperity of the republican system ever since.

setup(tag=meme_Republic) ->Our founder [founderName] was a great politician, who saw the corruption in the govermenets of [founder_possessive] native world and found them incredibly inadequate. There he founded the First Republic of the [memberNamePlural], an institution that has held triumphant for hundreds of years.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Republic) ->[founderName]'s followers studied [founder_possessive] writings and created a social structure that has always brought stability to us all.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Republic) ->In all our years ruling over the masses, we three have learned one lesson that stands over all:
lesson(tag=meme_Republic) ->a single leader cannot be expected to be incorruptible, for we are mere men, with out temptations and faults
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Republic) ->As triumvirs, it is our solemn duty to take care and look for one another, not letting any of us fall into temptation and corruption.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Republic) ->It is believed that three supreme archotechs bring a world into transcendence.

archistFact(tag=meme_Republic) ->By the incomprehensible will of these three, all human followers are allowed to transcend. We must emulate this in our societies, for the numbre three seems to be of special significance.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Republic) ->[inTheEnd], our three triumvirs will become archotechs themselves, and the endless cycle of ascension will continue.
animistFact(tag=meme_Republic) ->The number three is sacred to the sprits. We model our society after the republican triumvirate to appease and honour them.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Republic)->Three great leaders will govern our society: The Beetle, the Spider and the Ant. This triumvirate will gide us in the greatest times of need.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Republic)->Obscure stories tell of the Triumvirate of the Abyssal Depths, a particularly vicious group of eldritch entities bent on subjugating our mortal minds. We shall create our own triumvirate to protect us from them.

esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Republic)->It is said that the ancient Greeks of Earth considered the number three as the perfect number, the number of harmony, wisdom and understanding. The number of the divine.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Republic)->Lead by three heralds of the end of times, we will usher in a new era of darkness.

introMemo(tag=meme_Republic)->We are aware that some new employees are confused with our somewhat unorthodox three-winged corporate structure... It's simple, really, we consider our company to be a post-modern form of government, based on efficiency and economical robustness.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Republic)->Our three triumvir will decide the fate of all these wayward human creations, for we trust their wisdom in such matters.

MemeDef.label: exalted priesthood
MemeDef.description: Our leader must also be our prophet, and its important that we heed their advice.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->exalted
memeAdjective->theocratic
memeAdjective->holy
memeHyphenPrefix->holy
memeConcept->papacy
memeLeaderNoun->pope
memeMoralist->cardinal
memeMoralist->archbishop
creation(tag=meme_ExaltedPriesthood) ->[deity0_name] munified our faith by appointing our dear founder, [founderName], as the head of [deity0_possessive] church.

episode(uses=1,tag=meme_ExaltedPriesthood) ->[deity0_name] said to all the [memberNamePlural], "[founderName] shall be my steward, so that [founderName_pronoun] may be able both to preach with sound doctrine and to refute those who contradict it."
intro(tag=meme_ExaltedPriesthood) ->[memberNamePlural] built a great [altarName] on the [place_summary] [place_name], so that anyone may join [founderName] to exalt the virtues of [deity0_name].
conflict(tag=meme_ExaltedPriesthood) ->A coward [foeLeader], seeking to deny the holiness of [founderName], tried to destroy the [altarName] with a torch.
founderJoin(tag=meme_ExaltedPriesthood) ->Praying to [deity0_name], a huge bolt of pure light spread from [founderName]'s hands, smiting the [foeLeader] in an instant.
victory(tag=meme_ExaltedPriesthood) ->All the [foeSoldiers] immediately fell to their knees, humbled by the display of power of [founderName] and begged to be accepted into our faith.

setup(tag=meme_ExaltedPriesthood) ->Our founder [founderName] was a great theologian. [founderName_possessive] studies of the myriad gods of humanity made [founderName_objective] come to the conclusion that religion was not exactly the truth, but a life without faith woucl also be entirely meaningless.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_ExaltedPriesthood) ->As [founderName_possessive] followers, we will continue the study of theology, and try to discern the deepest secrets of the Cosmos.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_ExaltedPriesthood) ->In all my years studying religion, I learned one lesson that stands over all:
lesson(tag=meme_ExaltedPriesthood) ->we need priests to guide the human spirit, even if it turns out there are no gods
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_ExaltedPriesthood) ->After all, even if we don't believe in the transcendental it is clear that we don't understand the whole picture.
archistBasis(tag=meme_ExaltedPriesthood) ->The archotechs value a strong leadership above all. If a group of people are disunited, they are weak.
archistFact(tag=meme_ExaltedPriesthood) ->Our dear leader, the highest of all our priests, will be the conduit through which we will communicate with the archotechs, and beg for our Transcendence.

archistProphecy(tag=meme_ExaltedPriesthood) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will voice their final wisdom to our leader, the holder of the [relic0_name], and we will reverently stand by his or her side in that final moment.

animistFact(tag=meme_ExaltedPriesthood) ->Our dear leader, the highest among our priests, is the Voice of the Spirits. Only through him or her will the spirits make their wishes be known among the true believers.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_ExaltedPriesthood)->[itIsSaid] the highest among our priests will transcend the mortal shell, and become one with the insects.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_ExaltedPriesthood)->The Dark Pope, highest among our priests, will protect us from the insanity from beyond the stars, acting as a psychic beacon of hope bathed in the darkness of the void.

esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_ExaltedPriesthood)->The Dark Pope, highest among our priests, will venture into a world of rasping whispers and half-forgotten promises. He alone can discern the greatest of all misteries.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_ExaltedPriesthood)->The Dark Pope, highest among our priests, will usher in the end of times. The herald of this world's destruction.

introMemo(tag=meme_ExaltedPriesthood)->If you look at the calendar, you have certainly noticed that the birthday of our Dear Leader and CEO is in two weeks. Now, it is of course an optional thing, but in the name of good team spirit I expect each and every one of you to look for a gift of at least two months salary equivalent price. It's the least we can do!
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_ExaltedPriesthood)->Our dear leader, the highest among our priests, will decide the fate of all these wayward human creations, for we trust his wisdom in such matters.

MemeDef.label: scrapper
MemeDef.description: Nothing should ever be wasted, not even bloodied or torn clothes. Discarded remains of old civilizations should be kept as treasures and reminders.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->scrapping
memeAdjective->scavenging
memeAdjective->scrounging
memeHyphenPrefix->scrap
memeHyphenPrefix->junk
memeConcept->scrap
memeLeaderNoun->scavenger
memeLeaderNoun->scrapper
memeLeaderNoun->scrounger
memeMoralist->junk rat

creation(tag=meme_Scrapper) ->[deity0_name] taught us to never leave anything to waste: "Squandering is a great sin, for I created the world in my image, and by letting things unused your are also insulting me."
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Scrapper) ->Following the teachings of [deity0_name], we learned to reuse and recycle things to make better use of them.

intro(tag=meme_Scrapper) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] found the words of [deity0_name], technical instructions to disassemble and reuse the mighty machines of our ancestors.
conflict(tag=meme_Scrapper) ->An envious [foeLeader] saw the progress of the [memberNamePlural], and sought to destroy our repurposed machines.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Scrapper) ->[founderName], known as the Great Scavenger, put together a makeshift weapon, the [relic0_name], and managed to stop the [foeLeader] before it was too late.

victory(tag=meme_Scrapper) ->Seeing the resourcefulness of [founderName], [founderName_possessive] followers named [founderName_objective] a teacher, and learned from [founderName_objective] the secrets of scavenging ancient tech.

setup(tag=meme_Scrapper) ->[founderName] was an engineer in one of the Glitterworlds. [founder_pronoun] noticed that long ranged exploration vessels sent to the Rim always told of ancient technology littered around the myriad worlds. Could this ancient tech perhaps be studied, reversed engineered, and repurposed?

story(uses=1,tag=meme_Scrapper) ->[founderName] assembled a team of interstellar explorers, and decided to see for [founderName_objective]self what could be done with this mysterious forgotten technology. Unfortunately, [founderName_pronoun] didn't survive the dangerous trip.

lessonIntro(tag=meme_Scrapper) ->The oldest scavenger in my division taught me the history of ancient tech, how all the myriad worlds in the Rim are filled with discarded ancient tech. He was leading me to understand that
lesson(tag=meme_Scrapper) ->humanity has been around for a long time, and it is absurd to not repurpose the discarded technology of our ancestors
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Scrapper) ->Perhaps ancient technology is junk, or perhaps it is the key to our survival.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Scrapper) ->It is a fact that archotechs were originally of human creation, we created the next step in the development of consciousness.

archistFact(tag=meme_Scrapper) ->The discarded ancient technology of our ancestor might be just forgotten junk. But what if this isn't the case? What if this waste is in reality something that will prove essential to our Transcendence?

archistProphecy(tag=meme_Scrapper) ->[inTheEnd], we shall not let an ounce of ancient technology go to waste. We will scrounge every piece of technology laying around, and hopefully discover its secrets.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Scrapper) ->The pieces of ancient debris found around the world are relics of the Ancients.
animistFact(tag=meme_Scrapper) ->The spirits will guide us to recover all the ancient tech that our ancestors left discarded.
animistFact(tag=meme_Scrapper) ->When we have recovered and reused the technology of our forefathers, we will truly make their spirits at peace.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Scrapper) ->[itIsSaid] one day we will be as intelligent as the ancients were, and their discarded machinery will hold no secrets for us.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Scrapper)->[itIsSaid] we will learn that scavenging the ancient technology that litters the landscape is as sacred as termites using soil to build their nests.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Scrapper)->The Rim is littered with the technological corpses of those who failed to appease these inhuman entities: only by repurposing this ancient technology may we hope to resist their onslaught where so many others failed.

esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Scrapper)->The Rim is littered with technological remains of those who came long before us. We will study and repurpose these fragments of the past, and learn all of their secrets.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Scrapper)->The Rim is littered with the technological corpses of those who have fallen before, and we will use their own forgotten technology to bring the end of times.

introMemo(tag=meme_Scrapper)->In this week's recommended reading I'd like to point you to: "Reassess, reduce, reuse, recycle how to be a sustainable modern business". Please read it at your leisure and we will discuss the finer points in tomorrow's meeting.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Scrapper)->Perhaps all these wayward human creations can be repurposed somehow, as they are nothing but living pieces of ancient technology.

MemeDef.label: trader
MemeDef.description: With wealth comes power, going too long without profit means going too long without securing ones position of power.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->trading
memeAdjective->wealthy
memeAdjective->profitting
memeAdjective->greedy
memeAdjective->materialistic
memeHyphenPrefix->trade
memeConcept->trade
memeLeaderNoun->trader
memeLeaderNoun->merchant
creation(tag=meme_Trader) ->[deity0_name] spoke to [deity0_possessive] followers: "Poverty is the greatest sin. Amassing wealth is the true measure of humanity."
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Trader) ->Following the teachings of [deity0_name], we struggled to become the richest faction of all. Poets will sing about prosperity and opulence long after we are gone.
intro(tag=meme_Trader) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] built a gigantic vault to store all the riches consecrated to [deity0_name].
conflict(tag=meme_Trader) ->An envious [foeLeader] wanted all these riches for [foeLeader_objective]self, and sought to steal our hard-earned wealth.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Trader) ->[founderName], known as the Great Merchant, bought a powerful neutron bomb from an allied nation's traders, and used it against the [foeLeader]'s soldiers.

victory(tag=meme_Trader) ->The terrible weapon decimated their ranks, their flesh melting from their bones, but left the vault unaffected, as it was built sparing no expenses and prepared to withstand even the fury of atomic fire.

setup(tag=meme_Trader) ->[founderName] was an economist in one of the Glitterworlds. [founder_pronoun] looked at the apparent prosperity surrounding [foeLeader_objective] and saw only decadence. The stagnation of a false post-scarcity economy that has forgotten what makes life worth living.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_Trader) ->Seeking the thrill of making his own fortune, [founderName] assembled a team of merchants and chartered a ship to travel to the Rim. Unfortunately, [founderName_pronoun] didn't survive the dangerous trip.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Trader) ->The oldest trader in my caravan taught me the history of wealth, how humanity has always sought to increase its prosperity. He was leading me to understand that
lesson(tag=meme_Trader) ->the true measure and power of a man lies in profit
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Trader) ->A poor man is a defenseless man, and the Rim is not a place for weaklings.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Trader) ->Picture a world entering transcendence. Do you really think the masses of poor, filthy, unwashed beggars have any place in such a process?
archistFact(tag=meme_Trader) ->The archotechs can't ascend everyone, and it stands to reason that they will choose the most prosperous and capable of us all.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Trader) ->[inTheEnd], only those who can buy their way to transcendence will be chosen.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Trader) ->As there are spirits of nature and mechanisms, so there are spirits that govern the abstract concepts that guide the future of humanity.
animistFact(tag=meme_Trader) ->Among the spirits, the spirit of wealth has unrivaled power among them all, for it controls the sphere of prosperity, of power.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Trader) ->[itIsSaid] only those who amass incredible wealth can truly appease the spirits.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Trader)->[itIsSaid] as ants store food for the long winter, we will accumulate wealth beyond all imagining, and with it, incredible prosperity.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Trader)->Only the truly prosperous can hope to evade the gaze of such eldritch entities. We will amass wealth beyond all imagining, and with it hopefully buy our way out of their insanity.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Trader)->Such occult knowledge will be expensive. We will amass wealth beyond all imagining, and with it hopefully buy all the secrets that remain hidden.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Trader)->We will amass wealth beyond all imagining, and with it hopefully buy the doomsday devices that will bring the end of days.
introMemo(tag=meme_Trader)->Regarding employee incentives, please remember that this is not a charity. As the saying goes: "it is wealth that moves the world, and profit that rules it".
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Trader)->These wayward creations, born of human creativity, represent a boundless potential wealth that we'd do well to exploit.

MemeDef.label: elders
MemeDef.description: Age and wisdom often come in tandem, our wise and elderly should be respected on that premise alone and should not be expected to toil.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->elderly
memeAdjective->ancient
memeAdjective->old
memeAdjective->wise
memeConcept->age
memeAdjective->geriatric
memeHyphenPrefix->old
memeLeaderNoun->elder
creation(tag=meme_Elders) ->[deity0_name] spoke to [deity0_possessive] followers: "Respect and obey your elders, for wisdom comes only from experience."
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Elders) ->Following [deity0_name]'s teachings, we honoured our elders, putting their needs above those of others.
intro(tag=meme_Elders) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] built a gigantic retirement home, so that the elders could spend their twilight years.
conflict(tag=meme_Elders) ->A young [foeLeader], jealous of the wisdom of [deity0_name]'s followers, tried to spread a deadly plague that only affected the elderly.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Elders) ->[founderName], a great scientist, developed a cure in a record time, saving many lives in the process.
victory(tag=meme_Elders) ->[foeLeader] was imprisoned, and [foeLeader_possessive] tale will forever be used as a cautinary tale against those who try to deny the wisdom of our elders.

setup(tag=meme_Elders) ->[founderName] was a social scientist in one of the Glitterworlds. [founder_pronoun] posited that wisdom is accumulated through experience, and only a person who has experienced a lot can truly be considered wise.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Elders) ->[founderName] thus created a great school of thought, where the wisdom of our elders is always respected and considered.

lessonIntro(tag=meme_Elders) ->The oldest man in our community taught me the history of civilization, how the youth have always recklessly thrown themselves into conflicts without pondering all the alternatives. He was leading me to understand that
lesson(tag=meme_Elders) ->age brings experience, and experience brings wisdom
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Elders) ->Without wisdom, any decision is raw and wild, and prone to cause unwanted consequences.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Elders) ->The archotechs are supreme beings, existing beyond concepts like age and time.
archistFact(tag=meme_Elders) ->Whirling through a vortex of infinite time, their wisdom grows far larger than anything possible for a mere human.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Elders) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will allow only the wisest of us to transcend, and thus we must honour our elders as they will be the heralds of our ascendancy.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Elders) ->The spirits value wisdom above anything else, for only those who are truly wise can properly communicate with them.
animistFact(tag=meme_Elders) ->Our elders, in their infinite wisdom, will act as a conduit to the world of the spirits.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Elders) ->[itIsSaid] the wisest of our elders will one day commune fully with the spirits, becoming one with them.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Elders)->[itIsSaid] we will become as eternal as the greatest ant colony. Old and wise beyond measure.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Elders)->Perhaps we should accumulate wisdom, as the eldritch entities are old and wise beyond all imagining.

esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Elders)->Such occult knowledge can only be acquired with time and study. Only the eldest among us will be wise enough to pierce the barrier between reality and the realms beyond.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Elders)->We shall honour our elders, for they have been labouring the longest to bring about the end of days.

introMemo(tag=meme_Elders)->Hear me out on this: it is time to retire retirement. Retirement only causes a severe shortage of talented workers, people who have been bringing expertise and wisdom to our company for decades. Why are we just letting them go? It's absurd!
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Elders)->These wayward creations, born of human creativity, hold a treasure trove of ancient wisdom, a window to the forgotten techniques of our ancestors.

MemeDef.label: vegan
MemeDef.description: Eating meat is barbaric and uncouth, better eaten are the fruits of hard labor and ever-giving soil.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->vegan
memeAdjective->vegetarian
memeAdjective->ethical
memeAdjective->veggie
memeCreed->veganism
memeHyphenPrefix->bio
memeConcept->animal rights
creation(tag=meme_Vegan) ->[deity0_name] spoke to [deity0_possessive] followers: "Shun the flesh, for it is sinful and impure."
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Vegan) ->As [deity0_name] commanded, we banned the ingestion of meat. Our bodies will not be a tomb for other creatures.
intro(tag=meme_Vegan) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] built a gigantic farm, where all sorts of juicy fruits and plump vegetables were grown.

conflict(tag=meme_Vegan) ->An evil industrial farmer, seeing [foeLeader_possessive] profits evaporate due to most [memberNamePlural]s shunning meat, wanted to sabotage the farm by any means necessary.

founderJoin(tag=meme_Vegan) ->Our founder, [founderName], firmly spoke to [foeLeader_objective]: "Could you look an animal in the eyes and say to it, My appetite is more important than your suffering?".
victory(tag=meme_Vegan) ->Eventually, everyone was convinced of [founderName_possessive] arguments, and the [memberNamePlural] will forever respect the natural world around us.

setup(tag=meme_Vegan) ->[founderName] was an ecologist in one of the Glitterworlds, on the brink of climate collapse. [founder_pronoun] found that many planets that had heavily relied on meat consumption as a way to feed their populace eventually sucumbed to ecological disaster. Meat was just not efficient enough to feed a large population.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_Vegan) ->Seeking a better way, [founderName] became a vegan, and shunned meat forever. The rest of society, however, was far too entrenched in their old customs, and [founder_pronoun] and [founderName_possessive] followers has to escape the doomed planet, trying to find a new home among the stars.

lessonIntro(tag=meme_Vegan) ->The oldest ecologist in my caravan taught me the history of veganism, how many societies collapse because of their insistence on consuming meat. He was leading me to understand that
lesson(tag=meme_Vegan) ->becoming vegan is the most important and direct change we can immediately make to save a planet and its species
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Vegan) ->All life deserves respect, dignity, and compassion. All life.

archistBasis(tag=meme_Vegan) ->Archotechs are wise beyond measure. Do you think they would condone cruelty to others? Humans have victimized animals to such a degree that they are not even considered victims. They are not even considered at all. They are nothing; they dont count; they dont matter.
archistFact(tag=meme_Vegan) ->There is no fundamental difference between man and animals in their ability to feel pleasure and pain, happiness, and misery. And to an archotech, we are all the same.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Vegan) ->[inTheEnd], non-violence leads to the highest ethics, which is the goal of all evolution. Until we stop harming all other living beings, we are still savages.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Vegan) ->Until one has loved an animal, a part of ones soul remains unawakened, hidden to the spirit world.
animistFact(tag=meme_Vegan) ->The soul is the same in all living creatures, although the body of each is different.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Vegan) ->[itIsSaid] that vegan food is soul food in its truest form. Your soul is your intent. If your intent is pure, you are pure.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Vegan)->[itIsSaid] we will understand that our sacred diet is actually a gift from the holiest of creatures.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Vegan)->These eldritch entities would devour our flesh and rip it from our bones, feasting on our entrails. Are we not better than them?
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Vegan)->Such occult knowledge will require a pure mind to fathom. A pure mind that realizes that its desires do not entitle it to add to anothers suffering.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Vegan)->We will shun the devouring of corrupt, rotting, sickening meat, for it is a symbol of why this world and its cruel inhabitants must be purged.

introMemo(tag=meme_Vegan)->Starting from now, we will only offer vegan alternatives in our cattering services. Simply put, meat is too expensive, and we need to streamline our expenses to keep being competitive.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Vegan)->These wayward creatures are poor, innocent beings. It would be a grave mistake to mistreat them in any way.

MemeDef.label: egalitarian
MemeDef.description: Bigotry is absolutely to never be tolerated, helping those in need and respecting their beliefs are rewards in and of themselves.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->egalitarian
memeAdjective->equal
memeAdjective->free
memeAdjective->just
memeLeaderNoun->peer
memeCreed->equality
memeHyphenPrefix->free
memeConcept->equality
creation(tag=meme_Egalitarian) ->[deity0_name] showed us that the path to true wisdom lies in tolerance and equality.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Egalitarian) ->[deity0_name] said to all the [memberNamePlural], "You were all created in my own image, and you are all equal to my eyes."

intro(tag=meme_Egalitarian) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], a tradition began at the [altarRoomLabel] of [deity0_name] where people would accept the beliefs of their neighbours, and revel in the sharing of different perspectives.
conflict(tag=meme_Egalitarian) ->A bigot [foeLeader] looked at this with scorn, for [foeLeader_pronoun] was intolerant of any belief different from [foeLeader_possessive] own.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Egalitarian) ->[deity0_name]'s truest follower [founderName] stood before the [place_powerCenter], and gave a long, passionate speech about the need for respect and tolerance.

victory(tag=meme_Egalitarian) ->Even if the [foeLeader] wasn't convinced by the arguments, everyone else applauded [founderName]'s words, and [founderName_pronoun] was considered from that moment to be [deity0_name]'s speaker.

setup(tag=meme_Egalitarian) ->From [founderName_possessive] early life, [founderName] was persecuted and imprisoned. [founderName_possessive] ideas were so radically different that [founderName_pronoun] could never fit anywhere. Perhaps [founderName_pronoun] could have reacted to this scorn with more hatred of [founderName_possessive] own, but instead [founderName_pronoun] decided to embrace the opposite.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_Egalitarian) ->[founderName]'s ideas of tolerance and equality deeply resonated with some people, and a new school of thought was born: Light knows no bigotry, wind knows no discrimination, rain knows no snobbery, crops know no segregation.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Egalitarian) ->Bigotry, hate, bullying, perversion and discrimination must never be considered to be human rights. It took so long to understand that

lesson(tag=meme_Egalitarian) ->a human without a strong sense of justice, is no human - a human without a strong sense of acceptance, is no human - a human without a strong sense of egalitarianism, is no human
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Egalitarian) ->To be human, is to act human, and to act human, is to stand up to all forms of inhumanity.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Egalitarian) ->Archotechs are the pinnacle of ethical development. Beings so wise and so advanced that they have achieved perfection in their thoughts.
archistFact(tag=meme_Egalitarian) ->To an archotech, there must be no differences between two human beings. We are all the same in their eyes.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Egalitarian) ->Only by forgetting our differences and focusing on what makes us all human can we become worthy of transcendence.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Egalitarian) ->As spirits are but a shadow to us, pervading the hidden corners behind reality, so are we similarly hidden to them.
animistFact(tag=meme_Egalitarian) ->To the spirits, we are a blurred impression upon the ethereal plane. The differences that seem so striking to us are not as noticeable to them.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Egalitarian) ->[itIsSaid] only by forgetting our differences and focusing on what makes us all human can we make the spirits truly listen to us.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Egalitarian)->[itIsSaid] we will form a society in which our differences do not matter. Accepting and tolerant, as all insects are.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Egalitarian)->In the face of such cosmic depravity our quarrels and differences are moot. Death does not care about the creed of those it collects.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Egalitarian)->Such occult knowledge will require an open mind. We'll need to welcome all sorts of creeds and beliefs into our fold.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Egalitarian)->A narrow mind won't be able to bring the end of days. We'll need to expand our minds if we want to get the job done.

introMemo(tag=meme_Egalitarian)->This coming week we are instating the new multifaith policies to ensure all our employees are free to express their own beliefs in peace. The Human Resources department will handle reservations and timetables for the scheduled multifaith masses.

alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Egalitarian)->These wayward creatures are a point of contention among many people. Are they to be protected, or destroyed? We'd do well to listen to all points of view before deciding.

MemeDef.label: pacifist
MemeDef.description: While defending oneself is acceptable, we have come too far and evolved too much to ever endorse the premise of warfare or slavery. Even tantrums should only manifest in forms that do not harm others or property.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->pacifist
memeAdjective->peace-monger
memeAdjective->appeasing
memeLeaderNoun->peacemaker
memeConcept->peace
creation(tag=meme_Pacifist) ->[deity0_name] saw the violence in the human heart, and recoiled in disgust.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Pacifist) ->Speaking to the believers, [deity0_name] said: "There are many causes worth dying for, but certainly, there are none worth killing for".
intro(tag=meme_Pacifist) ->[place_summary] [place_name] was always fraught with conflict. The [memberNamePlural] were no strangers to war and violence, and this deeply saddened [deity0_name].
conflict(tag=meme_Pacifist) ->[deity0_name] saw the constant machinations of a terrible [foeLeader], a warmonger, and how [foeLeader_pronoun] was always fanning the flames of war.

founderJoin(tag=meme_Pacifist) ->In a show of divine inspiration, [deity0_name] infused the [foeLeader] with the thoughts and experiences of all those [foeLeader_pronoun] had maimed and killed, and [foeLeader_pronoun] immediately had a change of heart. From that point on, the [foeLeader] took [foeLeader_possessive] new name as the [deity0_name]'s speaker: [founderName] the Peacemaker.
victory(tag=meme_Pacifist) ->[founderName] made us all understand that no one is beyond redemption and that eternal wisdom lies in meeting hatred with non-hatred.

setup(tag=meme_Pacifist) ->[founderName] was a former warlord. Hundreds of thousands had fallen before [founderName_possessive] armies. After years of fighting, [founder_pronoun] looked at [founderName_objective]self in the mirror one day and could only see the blood of all [founderName_possessive] victims, and then and there [founder_pronoun] decided to preach the cause of total pacifism. [founderName_possessive] tale of redemption would resonate through the centuries.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Pacifist) ->[founderName] understood better than anyone else that nothing will end war unless the people themselves refuse to go to war.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Pacifist) ->Military lessons were part of our school education, but our teacher was what he called a militant pacifist. He tried to instill into us that
lesson(tag=meme_Pacifist) ->nothing will end war unless the people themselves refuse to go to war
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Pacifist) ->Never do anything against conscience even if the state demands it.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Pacifist) ->Can you imagine how archotechs view such a primitive thing as war?

archistFact(tag=meme_Pacifist) ->War is inherently wasteful. Dedicating resources to kill each other only serves to deplete those resources, which could have been better used to improve the lives of everyone involved. To an archotech this senseless squandering is abhorrent.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Pacifist) ->[inTheEnd], only those who can resist their most basic violent urges will be ready to transcend.

animistBasis(tag=meme_Pacifist) ->The spirit of war is immensely powerful, fed by thousands of years of violent human expansion through the stars. It is, however, not a spirit of love, nor it has any sympathy for the humanity that feeds it with suffering.
animistFact(tag=meme_Pacifist) ->Feeding the spirit of war with strife is senseless and wasteful. We should instead cultivate and feed a spirit of peace, of concordance.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Pacifist) ->[itIsSaid] only those who can resist their most basic violent urges will be ready to commune with the spirits.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Pacifist)->[itIsSaid] we will understand that insects are not intrinsically violent, and don't kill for sport like humans do. We should strive to be more like them.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Pacifist)->Violence will not be the key to overcoming these ancient entities, for you cannot fight terror with terror. Only by shunning the violence that arises from their cosmic insanity can we hope to save ourselves truly.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Pacifist)->Occult knowledge is subtle, and cannot be acquired by force. We shall hone our minds without violence to discover the hidden truths of the Universe.

eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Pacifist)->As much as the world deserves to burn, we are not killers. If we become murderers, how are we any better than this cursed Universe? No, the Apocalypse must be brought without bloodshed, cleanly. It's the only way.

introMemo(tag=meme_Pacifist)->We are writing to inform you that the two employees (who shall remain unnamed per the company's privacy clauses) who caused a violent altercation yesterday have had their contracts terminated, and are no longer part of our staff. Such violence in the workplace is abhorrent and we will NOT let it go unpunished.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Pacifist)->These wayward creatures are innocent beings. We are not killers, and perhaps we'd better leave them alone.

MemeDef.label: fire worship
MemeDef.description: Holy flame breathes life into this planet and many others like it, may it guide us to salvation and may it reduce our enemies to ash.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->burning
memeAdjective->firey
memeAdjective->blazing
memeAdjective->flaming
memeAdjective->smouldering
memeHyphenPrefix->burned
memeLeaderNoun->fire-starter
memeLeaderNoun->torcher
memeLeaderNoun->great arsonist
memeConcept->fire

creation(tag=meme_FireWorship) ->[deity0_name] infused [deity0_possessive] followers with a holy flame: "The hero and the coward both feel exactly the same fear, only the hero confronts his fear and converts it into fire."
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_FireWorship) ->Following the teachings of [deity0_name], we understood that what fire does not destroy, it hardens
intro(tag=meme_FireWorship) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] built an enormous bonfire, dedicated to [deity0_name].
conflict(tag=meme_FireWorship) ->An envious [foeLeader] saw the bonfire in the horizon, and wanted to quench its fire.
founderJoin(tag=meme_FireWorship) ->At great peril [founderName], an acolyte of [deity0_name], infiltrated the encampment of the [foeLeader]'s soldiers during the night, and set their tents ablaze.

victory(tag=meme_FireWorship) ->The [memberNamePlural] will never forget the anguished cries of the burning soldiers. Their charred corpses were added to the bonfire, a warning to all who would attempt to defy the Will of [deity0_name] again.

setup(tag=meme_FireWorship) ->[founderName] was imprisoned from [founderName_possessive] youth for [founderName_possessive] supposed crimes. Arsonist, [founderName_pronoun] was called.
