What they failed to see is that [founderName_pronoun] was instead a visionary, a prophet. [founderName_pronoun] saw the hidden patterns that are inside all flames.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_FireWorship) ->A small spark can start a great fire, and the philosophy of [founderName] became a dominant school of thought that spread across the stars.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_FireWorship) ->I found them among the ashes: blackened, charred remains that were disfigured beyond recognition. It was sad, but I had warned them that
lesson(tag=meme_FireWorship) ->fire is never a gentle master
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_FireWorship) ->The deepest lessons come out of the deepest waters and the hottest fires.
archistBasis(tag=meme_FireWorship) ->The archotechs are wise, pure. They manifest themselves to us in the most tangible of all visible mysteries fire.

archistFact(tag=meme_FireWorship) ->It is said that a world entering transcendence is engulfed in continent-wide wildfires. A mystical fire that doesn't consume, but instead gathers souls to allow them to ascend.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_FireWorship) ->[inTheEnd], only those who are worthy of the sacred fire will be allowed to evolve beyond their human selves.
animistBasis(tag=meme_FireWorship) ->There is no stronger spirit than the spirit of fire. All other spirits are subservient to it.
animistFact(tag=meme_FireWorship) ->The wavering flames offer us an insight into the world of spirits, for they represent the transmogrification of wood into ashes.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_FireWorship) ->[itIsSaid] only those who venerate fire will be able to appease the spirits.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_FireWorship)->[itIsSaid] we will be like a fire-chaser beetle, drawn to flames as the source of all life.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_FireWorship)->By mastering and controlling the holy fire we might be able to evade these cosmic monstrosities, and perhaps burn them to ashes if they decide to end us.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_FireWorship)->Studying the holy flame will bring precious insights into the nature of the Universe, for fire is the ultimate, purest expression of entropy.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_FireWorship)->We will watch it all burn.

introMemo(tag=meme_FireWorship)->Let me remind you all that this week's fire evacuation drill has been scheduled one hour earlier than usual. We take safety measures very seriously here: fire may be sacred, but a burned employee harms profits.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_FireWorship)->All these wayward creatures, forgotten creations of humanity, will serve as kindling for the flames.

MemeDef.label: bushido
MemeDef.description: A warrior's code of honor means striking down ones foes unto death itself. Should ones spirit falter and cowardice prevail, forgiveness can only be found in the afterlife.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->honourable
memeAdjective->courageous
memeAdjective->skilled
memeAdjective->loyal
memeLeaderNoun->daimyo
memeConcept->courage
creation(tag=meme_Bushido) ->[deity0_name] spoke to [deity0_possessive] followers: "Act with the heart of the warrior."

episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Bushido) ->The teachings of [deity0_name] to his followers emphasized honour, courage and skill: "All men make mistakes, but a good man yields when he knows his course is wrong, and repairs the evil".
intro(tag=meme_Bushido) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] built a gigantic dj, a sacred hall where [deity0_name]'s ways were taught.
conflict(tag=meme_Bushido) ->Judging it wasteful, the magistrates wanted to demolish the dj, using the land for more mundane purposes. They considered [deity0_name]'s ways to be obsolete.

founderJoin(tag=meme_Bushido) ->[founderName], a scholar and master of the martial arts, gathered [founderName_possessive] followers around, and asked them to show the ways of [deity0_name] to the magistrates, preaching their truth by example. They'd show them that only a life lived with honour, courage and skill is worth living.

victory(tag=meme_Bushido) ->The magistrates were humbled by the incredible display of virtue, and their hearts were changed. [founderName] gained great acclaim and [founderName_possessive] teachings spread across the stars.

setup(tag=meme_Bushido) ->[founderName] was a renowned martial artist in one of the Glitterworlds. [founder_pronoun] posited that only a life lived with honour, courage and skill is worth living. By setting one's heart right every morning and evening, he gains freedom in the Way. His whole life will be without blame, and he will succeed in his calling.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Bushido) ->Seeking inner peace, [founderName] gathered [founderName_possessive] followers and chartered a ship to travel to the Rim.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Bushido) ->It is thus that we learn one single truth: "you must live being true to the single purpose of the present moment". The most important thing I've learned is that
lesson(tag=meme_Bushido) ->only a life lived with honour, courage and skill is worth living
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Bushido) ->The best fighter is never angry.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Bushido) ->The archotechs are ascended beings, free of the basic instincts that plague humanity.
archistFact(tag=meme_Bushido) ->As supreme ethical beings, the archotechs show us that only a life lived with honour, courage and skill is worth living.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Bushido) ->[inTheEnd], only those warriors who are pure of heart will be allowed to transcend.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Bushido) ->There are many spirits of War, but the greatest among them all is the spirit of honour.
animistFact(tag=meme_Bushido) ->The greatest among the spirits teaches us that only a life lived with honour, courage and skill is worth living.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Bushido) ->[itIsSaid] only those warriors who are pure of heart can truly appease the spirits.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Bushido)->[itIsSaid] we will understand that insects teach us that only a life lived with honour, courage and skill is worth living.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Bushido)->They are the epitome of iniquity. Innately evil, immoral. They are a dark mirror that shows us that only a life lived with honour, courage and skill is worth living.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Bushido)->Such occult knowledge can't be acquired through dishonourable means, for only a life lived with honour, courage and skill is worth living.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Bushido)->Through the very end, we will keep ourselves pure, for only a life lived with honour, courage and skill is worth living.
introMemo(tag=meme_Bushido)->Remember our motto! "Only a life lived with honour, courage and skill is worth living". We encourage printing this on stickers to decorate your offices.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Bushido)->These wayward creatures, forgotten and discarded creations of humanity's hubris, remind us that only a life lived with honour, courage and skill is worth living.

MemeDef.label: light
MemeDef.description: Darkness obscures ones vision as well as ones mind, darklight is a wicked occurrence and is not to be condoned.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->light
memeAdjective->bright
memeHyphenPrefix->light
memeHyphenPrefix->bright
memeConcept->light
memeLeaderNoun->lightforged
memeLeaderNoun->paladin
memeLeaderAdjective->light
memeMoralist->enlightener
creation(tag=meme_Light) ->In the beginning [deity0_name] created the heaven and the earth. And [deity0_pronoun] said: "Let there be light". And there was light.

episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Light) ->[deity0_name] saw the light, that it was good: and [deity0_name] divided the light from the darkness. And [deity0_name] called the light Day, and the darkness [deity0_pronoun] called Night.

intro(tag=meme_Light) ->And [deity0_name] said: "Let there be lights in the firmament of the heaven to divide the day from the night; and let them be for signs, and for seasons, and for days, and years". A temple was erected by the [memberNamePlural] to commemorate [deity0_name]'s words.
conflict(tag=meme_Light) ->An envious [foeLeader] looked at these wonders, and wanted to plunge the Universe into darkness.

founderJoin(tag=meme_Light) ->[founderName], the greatest prophet of [deity0_name], prayed for help, and [deity0_name] made two great lights; the greater light to rule the day, and the lesser light to rule the night: [deity0_pronoun] made the stars also. And [deity0_name] set them in the firmament of the heaven to give light upon the world.
victory(tag=meme_Light) ->The [foeLeader] was humbled, and fled in terror, for the light of the sun was stronger than his will.

setup(tag=meme_Light) ->[founderName] was a relief worker in a forgotten Rim world. [founder_pronoun] looked at the poverty and the squalor of the regressed tribes, and understood that only purity of heart and thought can overcome the challenges faced by humanity.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Light) ->[founderName] created the largest NGO known to man, and volunteers spread across the stars to share [founder_possessive] message of concord and peace.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Light) ->Volunteering is at the very core of being a human. No one has made it through life without someone elses help. I want you to understand that
lesson(tag=meme_Light) ->the best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Light) ->That's what dispelling the darkness means.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Light) ->The archotechs, from their beginning, perceived the universe using senses beyond the physical. Their clarity of thought bathes the Universe in light.
archistFact(tag=meme_Light) ->By clouding our senses with darkness, all we are doing is stopping us from understanding the universe the way the archotechs do.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Light) ->[inTheEnd], we will banish darkness forever and unlock the wisdom of the archotechs for all humanity.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Light) ->The world of the spirits is a world covered in darkness, blocking them from interacting directly with the material world.
animistFact(tag=meme_Light) ->We must banish the darkness of the spirit realm, and bathe it with light so that the spirits can truly see us for what we are.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Light) ->[itIsSaid] only those who can peer unblinded into the spirit realm can truly communicate with the spirits.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Light)->[itIsSaid] we will stare unblinking with multi-faceted eyes into an Universe of pure radiance, feee from the darkness that binds us to our fragile mammal shells.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Light)->These eldritch entities revel in darkness. A sentient, tenebrous darkness of spiral black-vortices that seeps into your very being. Thus we shall embrace the light to forever banish their void of madness.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Light)->Such occult knowledge lies in the dark. Thus we shall embrace the light to banish the secrets that scheme to keep hidden from us.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Light)->A blinding light will herald the end of days, bathing the world in a deadly, annihilating brilliance.

introMemo(tag=meme_Light)->As scheduled, the new blue-coloured neon light fixtures will be installed on all our offices beginning next Tuesday. These are energy-efficient lights, so good for the environment!
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Light)->These wayward creatures have veered too far from the light, and wander into darkness.

MemeDef.label: nomad
MemeDef.description: Stagnation is death and as with all things in this world, homes are only temporary. Traveling this world and walking roads unwalked always leads to greater things.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->nomad
memeAdjective->itinerant
memeAdjective->travelling
memeAdjective->transient
memeHyphenPrefix->rover
memeConcept->wandering
memeConcept->travelling
memeLeaderNoun->wayfarer
memeLeaderNoun->wanderer

creation(tag=meme_Nomad) ->[deity0_name] wrote [deity0_possessive] commandments in seven clay tablets. The third commandment read: "A nomad I will remain for life, in love with distant and uncharted places."
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Nomad) ->In accordance with [deity0_name]'s precepts, we shunned the building of cities and spent our lives on the move, free from the shackles of sedentism.
intro(tag=meme_Nomad) ->The [memberNamePlural] were restless, for [deity0_name] had commanded them not to build a city and settle, and they were tired of roaming around living off the land.
conflict(tag=meme_Nomad) ->One of the elders wanted to defy [deity0_name]'s commandments, lured by the promises of fertile fields and high walls to defend ourselves from enemies.

founderJoin(tag=meme_Nomad) ->[founderName], the Great Khan, grew tired of the insolence of the elders, and had them all hanged. From that point on, the [memberNamePlural] would be the most skilled nomads in the land, never staying in the same spot for long.
victory(tag=meme_Nomad) ->It was thus that we became enamoured with wanderlust, and traveled the whole world without setting roots.

setup(tag=meme_Nomad) ->[founderName] was a skilled survivalist, tired of the smothering multitudes in huge cities. [founder_pronoun] longed for a return to simple times, smaller communities, where people were free to roam the countryside without having to worry about settling down.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_Nomad) ->Seeking the thrill of adventure, [founderName] assembled a small group of [founder_possessive] followers and chartered a ship to travel to the Rim. Unfortunately, [founderName_pronoun] died a few years later in the wilderness, for the Rim is far more savage than [founder_pronoun] could ever imagine, but [founder_possessive] descendants carried on with [founder_possessive] nomadic ways.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Nomad) ->Have you ever been to a crowded city? Even the greatest human cities are cesspools of disease, violence, corruption. It is abundantly clear that
lesson(tag=meme_Nomad) ->the true nature of humans is to live in small, nomadic communities
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Nomad) ->It is obscene to settle in a given place and multiply like pests.

archistBasis(tag=meme_Nomad) ->Cities are obscene to the archotechs. After transcendence there is no need to phisically occupy such huge spaces, drowning nature in a cacophony of tortured metal and bricks.
archistFact(tag=meme_Nomad) ->The archotechs teach us that the proper way to live is to form small, nomadic communities, respectful of their environment.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Nomad) ->[inTheEnd], those who spend their whole lives holed in a city won't transcend, while those who are infused by wanderlust will join the archotechs.

animistBasis(tag=meme_Nomad) ->Spirits govern everything, from the most abstract concepts to concrete ones. Specifically, each place has its own spirit, and that's why settling a bustling, noisy, dirty city in a given spot is harmful to the spirit of that place.
animistFact(tag=meme_Nomad) ->The spirit of wanderlust is a powerful one, and instills one with a passion for freedom, for exploration: you never know what the road ahead may bring.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Nomad) ->[itIsSaid] only those who are able to live without roots and roam free can truly appease the spirits.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Nomad)->[itIsSaid] we will live free, like insects roaming across the whole land searching for whatever the road brings next.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Nomad)->Staying in a single place will attract the ire of these eldritch entities. It is better to constantly be on the run, and never, never look behind you, for comic horrors await.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Nomad)->Such occult knowledge will be extremely difficult to find, and we must roam free, searching every corner of the world.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Nomad)->We will scour every corner of the world, never resting, never slowing down, until we bring the end of days.

introMemo(tag=meme_Nomad)->In the interest of dedication, flexibility, and resolve, we have decided to implement a new policy of "mobile offices" that will greatly increase our productivity. Thank you for trusting in our ability to find new ways to continue to provide the best goods and services for our customers, all the while caring for our employees.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Nomad)->These wayward creatures can be our companions on the road, forever looking for a place where they can fit in.

MemeDef.label: blood court
MemeDef.description: Our leader should be a talented melee fighter and brutal warrior, only usurped by one greater. Bloodshed, corpses, scars are a part of life and a show of strength on this planet.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->bloody
memeAdjective->brutal
memeConcept->strength
memeConcept->strife
memeLeaderNoun->bloodletter
memeLeaderNoun->gladiator

creation(tag=meme_BloodCourt) ->[deity0_name] had slain the majority of the other gods, and [deity0_possessive] followers cowered in fear: "Strength comes from an indomitable will. Only those of you who prove themselves in bloody combat will be worthy of my respect."

episode(uses=1,tag=meme_BloodCourt) ->Following the teachings of [deity0_name], we learned the most important lesson: "Don't wait for extraordinary opportunities. Seize common occasions and make them great. Weak men wait for opportunities; strong men make them".

intro(tag=meme_BloodCourt) ->The [memberNamePlural] were renowned for their gladiatorial ring, dedicated to [deity0_name]. Bloody matches to the death were fought there to decide who would be the next leader.

conflict(tag=meme_BloodCourt) ->[founderName] was challenged to a duel. A joyous occasion for which the whole community set aside their differences. The winner would be the next leader and guide us to greatness.
founderJoin(tag=meme_BloodCourt) ->[founderName], however, knew that [founder_possessive] opponent was going to cheat, for [deity0_name] had whispered the truth in [founder_possessive] dreams.

victory(tag=meme_BloodCourt) ->While combat outside the ring was prohibited between adult members of the community, [deity0_name] allowed [founderName] to behead [founder_possessive] on his sleep, a complete humiliation and a disgrace for his family, thus consolidating [founderName]'s rule.

setup(tag=meme_BloodCourt) ->[founderName] was a rampaging warlord, constantly fighting the remnants of a fallen star empire. [founder_pronoun] understood that conflict and strife are what guides a civilization. Complacency brings stagnation.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_BloodCourt) ->[founder_pronoun] taught us that a strong, successful man is not the victim of his environment. He creates favorable conditions. His own inherent force and energy compel things to turn out as he desires.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_BloodCourt) ->It was incredibly tough to grow up in that place, and not all of us made it. Even so, those who perished in the struggle made clear that
lesson(tag=meme_BloodCourt) ->difficulties are meant to rouse, not discourage. The human spirit is to grow strong by conflict
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_BloodCourt) ->You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
archistBasis(tag=meme_BloodCourt) ->Archotechs respect strength above all things. For those who are weak and defenseless are not truly human, and indeed worthless.
archistFact(tag=meme_BloodCourt) ->To them, a person worthy of transcendence is an ordinary individual who finds strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_BloodCourt) ->[inTheEnd], only those who impose their will upon others by force will be worthy to ascend.
animistBasis(tag=meme_BloodCourt) ->The spirits respect strength above all things. For those who are weak and defenseless are not truly human, and indeed worthless.
animistFact(tag=meme_BloodCourt) ->To the spirits, a worthy person is an ordinary individual who finds strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_BloodCourt) ->[itIsSaid] only those who impose their will upon others by force will be able to appease the spirits.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_BloodCourt)->[itIsSaid] we will crush all opposition that stands in our way.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_BloodCourt)->If we want to oppose these cruel eldritch entities, we can't abide weakness. Only by showing true strength do we even stand a chance against cosmic insanity.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_BloodCourt)->Such occult knowledge won't be acquired without violence. Only by showing true strength can we hope to unlock the secrets of the Cosmos.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_BloodCourt)->Of course, people will resist, clinging to their pathetic existance in this doomed, cursed world. We will crush them.

introMemo(tag=meme_BloodCourt)->Are you interested in a promotion? I'm glad to inform you all that from now on we are scheduling company-approved gladiator fights around the coffee machine. Tired of your boss? Prove it!
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_BloodCourt)->These wayward creatures can show us what strength looks like, and by overpowering them we might prove to ourselves that we are deserving of it.

MemeDef.label: city builders
MemeDef.description: Our home should feature all the accommodations of a great city, homes, workshops, and places of leisure should all be present and accessible by all.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->building
memeAdjective->industrious
memeLeaderNoun->great builder
memeLeaderNoun->architect
memeConcept->cities

creation(tag=meme_CityBuilders) ->[deity0_name] thus spoke to us: "Build these cities and surround them with walls and towers, gates and bars. The land is yours because you have sought me; On every lofty mountain and on every high hill there will be streams running with water, until the towers fall".

episode(uses=1,tag=meme_CityBuilders) ->Following the teachings of [deity0_name], we struggled to become the richest faction of all. Poets will sing about prosperity and opulence long after we are gone.
intro(tag=meme_CityBuilders) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] built the greatest city, with a grand temple dedicated to [deity0_name].

conflict(tag=meme_CityBuilders) ->An envious [foeLeader] wanted to conquer this city, for he was jealous of the leisure its inhabitants enjoyed. [foeLeader_possessive] assembled a huge army, and laid siege to the city.

founderJoin(tag=meme_CityBuilders) ->[founderName], known as the Great Magistrate, laughed at this temerity. Didn't the [foeLeader] know that the city was sacred to [deity0_name]? Its walls were tall as mountains, and impenetrable.

victory(tag=meme_CityBuilders) ->After several months, the [foeLeader] was forced to retreat, as most of [foeLeader_possessive] men were dying of starvation and exposure. The city had't fallen, and it would stand proud for millenia to come.

setup(tag=meme_CityBuilders) ->[founderName] was a magistrate in a small settlement in the Rim. [founder_pronoun] believed that a squalid settlement stood little chance in the face of constant external threats, and he proposed a series of monumental construction projects that would turn the small hamlet into a sprawling metropolis.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_CityBuilders) ->[founderName] is remembered as ther Great Architect, and [founder_possessive] city would stand proud for millenia to come.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_CityBuilders) ->In the oldest tomes I studied the forgotten art of siege warfare. If we want to make our cities stand proud we must understand that
lesson(tag=meme_CityBuilders) ->the tallest, sturdiest walls are built not with stone, but with the work and sweat of men
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_CityBuilders) ->A well-defended city is resilient. A city built with love is invincible.
archistBasis(tag=meme_CityBuilders) ->The archotechs are the ultimate builders. The whole planet is transformed and adapted to suit their needs.
archistFact(tag=meme_CityBuilders) ->We will mimic the construction prowess of the archotechs in our own cities, creating marvels of engineering that will stand the test of time.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_CityBuilders) ->[inTheEnd], the greatest builders among us will be chosen and allowed to transcend.
animistBasis(tag=meme_CityBuilders) ->There is no greater spirit than the spirit of creation. It manifests itself in anything that is built by a skilled crafter.
animistFact(tag=meme_CityBuilders) ->We will erect incredible marvels of engineering. Sprawling cities that will be a testament to the power of the spirit of creation.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_CityBuilders) ->[itIsSaid] the greatest builders among us will be chosen and allowed to commune with the spirits.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_CityBuilders)->[itIsSaid] we will build enormous hive-cities, like human termite mounds that will bloat the sun.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_CityBuilders)->The raw, brutal power of these eldritch entities is so immense that only by holing up in well-defended, armoured cities can we hope to withstand their corrosive influence.

esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_CityBuilders)->Such occult knowledge will only be unlocked with extensive experimentation. We will build majestic libraries and laboratories, sprawling cities where science is analyzed and disected.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_CityBuilders)->We will build gigantic, spawling cities, from which our forces will pour like molten lead and burn the whole world.
introMemo(tag=meme_CityBuilders)->I'm happy to announce that we are opening seven new branches of the company. If you'd like to request a transference to any of them, please let me know ASAP.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_CityBuilders)->These wayward creatures can be useful when building our glorious cities.

MemeDef.label: mechanoid supremacy
MemeDef.description: Never tire, never wither, never need for sustenance. Mechanoids are humanity perfected and should be revered as our superiors.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->mechanoid
memeAdjective->machine
memeAdjective->cybernetic
memeCreed->perfection
memeCreed->mechanoids
memeHyphenPrefix->techno
memeHyphenPrefix->cyber
memeHyphenPrefix->mecha
memeConcept->technology
memeConcept->silicon
memeConcept->mechanoids
memeLeaderNoun->cyborg
memeLeaderAdjective->techno
memeLeaderAdjective->mecha

creation(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->[deity0_name] spoke to [deity0_possessive] followers: "Mechanoids were created in my image. Their form is sacred, and you must aspire to become more like them."
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->Following the teachings of [deity0_name], we built countless mechanoid statues with their divine forms.

intro(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] built a gigantic statue of a biped mechanoid, its surface covered in a myriad vicious scythes, said to resemble the divine image of [deity0_name].

conflict(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->An apostate [foeLeader] saw the image as blasphemous, as [foeLeader_pronoun] venerated a false deity [foeLeader_objective]self, and sought to topple the statue and imprison [deity0_name]'s followers.

founderJoin(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->[founderName], Great Mechanopriest of [deity0_name], prayed to [deity0_objective] to fight against the fearsome enemy, and [deity0_name] summoned from the skies the vessels of a mechanoid hive.
victory(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->The mechanoids slaughtered the [foeLeader] and [foeLeader_possessive] soldiers, forever cemmenting the power of [deity0_name].

setup(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->[founderName] spent most of [founder_possessive] life studying mechanoids. [founder_pronoun] came to believe that mechanoids were humanity perfected, the next stage of evolution.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->Seeking to continue [founder_possessive] studies, [founderName] assembled a team of scientists and chartered a ship to travel to the Rim, where [founder_possessive] experiments wouldn't be seen with fear and suspicion.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->My experiments with mechanoids were extensive and thorough. After many years of toiling I came to the conclusion that
lesson(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->mechanoids are humanity perfected, the next stage of evolution
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->Mechanoids never tire, never wither, never need for sustenance. They are simply superior to us organic beings in all respects.
archistBasis(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->Archotechs build innumerable mechanoids in their own image. Wondrous machines that are far beyond our capabilities.
archistFact(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->The mechanoids that are created by archotechs are perfect machines, never tiring, never withering, never needing for sustenance.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->[inTheEnd], only by studying and revering the mechanoids can we hope to get closer to the archotechs, and perhaps participate in transcendence.
animistBasis(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->Mechanoids are animated by the most powerful spirits of all. The ravening spirits of machines that hate all life.
animistFact(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->Only by appeasing the machine spirits can we hope to evade their ire, for they are blind to the material world.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->[itIsSaid] only those who venerate and revere the mechanoids can truly commune with the spirits.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy)->[itIsSaid] we will create the perfect being, a mechanoid insect infused with archotech technology that will bring a new era of prosperity.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy)->We are nothing to these eldritch entities, and only by fusing our bodies with those of the most powerful machines can we hope to stand a chance against them.

esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy)->Such occult knowledge will be hard to find. We will study the bodies of the mechanoids, for they are perfect beings and the key to unlocking the secrets of the Cosmos.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy)->We will emulate the rage and ferocity of the mechanoids, perfect beings who are hell-bent on eradicating humanity.

introMemo(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy)->Starting next quarter, we will provide a helpful mechanoid companion to each of our employees. They will come pre-configured with a brand new productivity suite that I think most of you will find super useful to increase your proactivity and ROI.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy)->These wayward creatures are faulty, mere biological machines that pale in comparison to any mechanoid, but they are a step in the right direction.

MemeDef.label: insectoid supremacy
MemeDef.description: The labyrinthine tunnels of the underdark ungulate with a seemingly limitless hive of relentless and brutal insects, we should not fear them, we should revere them.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->insectoid
memeAdjective->chitinous
memeAdjective->insectile
memeCreed->perfection
memeCreed->insectoids
memeHyphenPrefix->bug
memeHyphenPrefix->fly
memeConcept->insects
creation(tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy) ->[deity0_name] visage is otherworldly: a moving mass of chitin-covered flesh, thousands of small insects constantly darting in and out of its armoured plates."

episode(uses=1,tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy) ->[deity0_name] commanded [deity0_possessive] followers: "respect and revere the insectoids, for they are my children and they were created in my own image".
intro(tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] built a great human hive, a testament to the glory of [deity0_name].
conflict(tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy) ->An evil [foeLeader] despised [foeLeader_possessive] neighbours, and wanted to return to the ancient times when men lived apart from each other, isolated.

founderJoin(tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy) ->[founderName], the Chosen of [deity0_name], heard of the apostasy of the [foeLeader], and sought to convince [foeLeader_objective] of the error of [foeLeader_possessive] isolationist ways.
victory(tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy) ->[founderName] extorted the virtues of [deity0_name]'s swarm cities, and the [foeLeader] was convinced of the truth behind [founder_possessive] words.

setup(tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy) ->[founderName] was a biologist in one of the Glitterworlds. [founder_pronoun] spent [founder_possessive] whole youth studying insectoids, and came to the conclusion that they are a perfect lifeform. Adaptive, strong and resilient.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy) ->Seeking to continue [founder_possessive] studies, [founderName] assembled a team of scientists and chartered a ship to travel to the Rim, where [founder_possessive] experiments wouldn't be seen with fear and suspicion.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy) ->My experiments with insectoids were extensive and thorough. After many years of toiling I came to the conclusion that
lesson(tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy) ->insectoids are the perfect lifeform, the next stage of evolution
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy) ->Insectoids are adaptive, strong and resilient. They are simply superior to us humans in all respects.
archistBasis(tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy) ->In their infinite wisdom, the archotechs inspired humans to bio-engineer the perfect lifeform: insectoids.
archistFact(tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy) ->Insectoids show us that biological evolution is just another step on the path to transcendence.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy) ->[inTheEnd], only those who properly revere the perfect forms of the insectoids will be chosen by the archotechs.
animistBasis(tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy) ->Among the animal spirits, those who watch over the insectoids are the most powerful.

animistFact(tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy) ->Insectoids are perfect creatures. Adaptive, strong and resilient. They are simply superior to us humans in all respects, and the spirits that govern them reign supreme.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy) ->[itIsSaid] only those who properly revere the perfect forms of the insectoids can truly appease the spirits.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy)->[itIsSaid] we will become like perfect, holy insects. I, for one, welcome our new insect overlords.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy)->We are nothing to these eldritch entities, and only by fusing our bodies with those of the most powerful insectoids can we hope to stand a chance against them.

esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy)->Such occult knowledge can be sought in the mysterious fractal patterns of an insectoid carapace. They are the perfect lifeform, the next stage of evolution.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy)->Like a devouring swarm of ravenous insects we will descend upon our enemies, and leave only their bones, devoid of flesh.

introMemo(tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy)->Concerning the constant reports about cockroaches in the cafeteria, need I remind you that cockroaches are living creatures, as worthy of respect as you and I? I will not allow a single more furtive call to a pest control company!
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_InsectoidSupremacy)->Among these genetically modified animals lies the insectoid geneline that was developed at Sorne, and that brought us the perfect lifeform.

MemeDef.label: party life
MemeDef.description: Let us toast to the acts of dance, drink and debauchery. Any free time is a good time, but party time is the best time.

rulesStrings.li: memeCreed->party
memeAdjective->revelling
memeAdjective->dancing
memeAdjective->enjoying
memeConcept->celebration
memeConcept->festivity
memeLeaderNoun->merrymaker
memeMoralist->reveler
creation(tag=meme_PartyLife) ->[deity0_name] spoke to [deity0_possessive] followers: "Mark this day in your calendars as an occasion for revelry, for celebrations are sacred to me."
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_PartyLife) ->From that day on, we celebrated.
intro(tag=meme_PartyLife) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] built a gigantic scenario. It would be the perfect place to party, and glorify [deity0_name].
conflict(tag=meme_PartyLife) ->The neighbours, however, weren't happy with the amount of noise, for they wanted their hard earned repose.
founderJoin(tag=meme_PartyLife) ->[founderName], known as the Great Reveler, would have none of that nonsense. Rest is for the weak! Bring more cocktails!
victory(tag=meme_PartyLife) ->So they turned the level of the music even higher. Party on!

setup(tag=meme_PartyLife) ->[founderName] was a renowned philosopher, [founder_possessive] name heard all across the stars. [founder_pronoun] posited that life is too short to be lived without enjoying oneself, and that only by extolling the virtues of a party life can one hope to be truly fulfilled.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_PartyLife) ->Unfortunately, [founder_pronoun] was found dead of an overdose a few years back. That must have been one hell of a party!
lessonIntro(tag=meme_PartyLife) ->Listen, listen, come closer. Oh, man, what a hangover... You see, I want to tell you that
lesson(tag=meme_PartyLife) ->I love going out. I love partying. Yeah, that's it
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_PartyLife) ->Now bugger off, and stop shouting. Damn, my poor head...
archistBasis(tag=meme_PartyLife) ->Do you really think the archotechs, in their infinite wisdom, care anything for those who don't know how to enjoy themselves?
archistFact(tag=meme_PartyLife) ->The archotechs can't ascend everyone, and it stands to reason that they will choose the funniest, happiest among us.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_PartyLife) ->[inTheEnd], only those who spend their lives partying in a thousand reveries will be allowed to transcend.
animistBasis(tag=meme_PartyLife) ->The spirits want us to enjoy life. What sense does it make to pass through life like a shadow?
animistFact(tag=meme_PartyLife) ->Among the spirits, the spirit of joy and revelry has unrivaled wisdom. It alone knows how to enjoy itself.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_PartyLife) ->[itIsSaid] only those who spend their lives partying in a thousand reveries can truly appease the spirits.

serketistProphecy(tag=meme_PartyLife)->[itIsSaid] we will party. This... actually has nothing to do with insects whatsoever. I guess... a beetle probably would enjoy a beer? Yeah, let's go with that. I'm drunk already anyway.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_PartyLife)->Such eldritch entities can't be fought, can't be defeated. We might as well be drunk out of our minds if we have to face them.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_PartyLife)->Such occult knowledge can't be faced sober.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_PartyLife)->The world will burn, and this is something that is better not to face sober.

introMemo(tag=meme_PartyLife)->It's our favourite time of the year already! The company's mandatory team-building exercise will be scheduled for this next Tuesday. Remember to bring your tennis paddles!
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_PartyLife)->I have heard there is even some weird lizard that turns plants into alcohol. Ohhh, man, I could hug that lizard right now.

MemeDef.label: anonymity
MemeDef.description: Knowing the names, faces, and backgrounds of your fellow colonists can be both a blessing and a curse.

rulesStrings.li: memeCreed->anonymity
memeAdjective->anonymous
memeAdjective->mysterious
memeAdjective->nameless
memeAdjective->inconspicuous
memeConcept->privacy
memeConcept->anonymity
memeLeaderNoun->anon
creation(tag=meme_Anonymity) ->[deity0_name] didn't speak to [deity0_possessive] followers, and instead just looked at them sternly. They understood the need for complete silence.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Anonymity) ->[deity0_name]'s utter silence was interpreted as a portent, and we have stayed silent since then.
intro(tag=meme_Anonymity) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] built a giant temple erected in complete silence, a mute testament to [deity0_name]'s will.

conflict(tag=meme_Anonymity) ->An evil [foeLeader] despised this silence, and wanted to plunge the world into a multitudinous cacophony. [foeLeader_pronoun] wanted to tear down the temple and watch it burn.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Anonymity) ->[founderName], the Silent One, would have nothing of this heressy, and plunged a poisoned blade into the heart of the [foeLeader] in the dead of night.
victory(tag=meme_Anonymity) ->[founderName] didn't want any accolades for [founder_possessive] acts, for [founder_pronoun] just wanted to be left alone.

setup(tag=meme_Anonymity) ->We are not really sure who [founderName] actually was. Perhaps [founder_pronoun] didn't even exist, and we just have a faint recollection of a mythology of sorts. In any case, it is ascribed to [founder_objective] that a solitary life of contemplation and isolation is a goal in and of itself.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Anonymity) ->Anonymity is a shield from the tyranny of the majority.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Anonymity) ->Let me put down these words on paper, for relaying them to you by voice is repulsive:
lesson(tag=meme_Anonymity) ->you never appreciate your anonymity until you don't have it anymore
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Anonymity) ->Wanting to be unknown, unpossessed by others' knowledge of you. That is freedom.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Anonymity) ->The archotechs are unknown and unknowable, shielded behind the ultimate mask: transcendence.
archistFact(tag=meme_Anonymity) ->The archotechs ask: "What is the purpose of civilization if not to grant the greatest of gifts, anonymity?".
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Anonymity) ->[inTheEnd], only those who spend their lives in anonymity will be allowed to transcend.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Anonymity) ->The spirits do not care about our meaningless identities, and would prefer us to stay anonymous.
animistFact(tag=meme_Anonymity) ->They show us that a solitary life of contemplation and isolation is a goal in and of itself.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Anonymity) ->[itIsSaid] only those who spend their lives in solitude and silence can truly commune with the spirits.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Anonymity)->[itIsSaid] we will fade into anonymity like a myriad ants, part of a whole but insignificant on their own.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Anonymity)->It is madness to raise our voice in defiance of these entities, and thus we shall remain silent, isolated, lest we attract their unwanted attention.

esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Anonymity)->Such occult knowledge can only be discovered through careful meditation. And perhaps we will discover that a solitary life of contemplation and isolation is a goal in and of itself.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Anonymity)->The world will burn, and we shall be the faceless and anonymous bringers of its downfall.
introMemo(tag=meme_Anonymity)->Lately we have had multiple instances of people using "Reply All" on company e-mails. Let me remind you that this is unnecessary and leads to confusion.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Anonymity)->Animals do not care about human. We can be ourselves with them, as they are not as prone to judgement as humans are.

MemeDef.label: emancipation
MemeDef.description: Its not enough to simply not participate in slavery, we should actively work to fight against those who dare to enslave others and free those who have suffered such inhumanities.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->emancipating
memeAdjective->liberating
memeAdjective->free
memeAdjective->independent
memeLeaderNoun->emancipator
memeCreed->emancipation
memeHyphenPrefix->free
memeConcept->freedom
creation(tag=meme_Emancipation) ->[deity0_name] showed us that slavery is aberrant, and should be stopped at all costs.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Emancipation) ->[deity0_name] said to all the [memberNamePlural], "Those who deny freedom to others, deserve it not for themselves."
intro(tag=meme_Emancipation) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], a tradition began at the [altarRoomLabel] of [deity0_name] where slaves were freed and given a new chance at life.
conflict(tag=meme_Emancipation) ->A bigot [foeLeader] looked at this with scorn, for [foeLeader_pronoun] was a slaver that saw [foeLeader_possessive] profits threatened.

founderJoin(tag=meme_Emancipation) ->[deity0_name]'s truest follower [founderName] stood before the [place_powerCenter], and gave a long, passionate speech about emancipation and the evils of slavery.

victory(tag=meme_Emancipation) ->Even if the [foeLeader] wasn't convinced by the arguments, everyone else applauded [founderName]'s words, and [founder_pronoun] was considered from that moment to be [deity0_name]'s speaker.

setup(tag=meme_Emancipation) ->[founderName] was born in an oppressive urbworld where slavery was commonplace. [founder_pronoun] grew up seeing other human beings being used as property, and this deeply disgusted [founder_objective].

story(uses=1,tag=meme_Emancipation) ->[founderName] set out to abolish slavery in [founder_possessive] native planet, and with [founder_possessive] success [founder_possessive] philosophy spread across the stars.

lessonIntro(tag=meme_Emancipation) ->Slavery is theft -- theft of a life, theft of work, theft of any property or produce, theft even of the children a slave might have borne. It is so important you understand that
lesson(tag=meme_Emancipation) ->nature made no man a slave
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Emancipation) ->To subjugate another is to subjugate yourself.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Emancipation) ->Archotechs are the pinnacle of ethical development. Beings so wise and so advanced that they have achieved perfection in their thoughts.
archistFact(tag=meme_Emancipation) ->To an archotech, slavery is an abhorrent sin. Treating another human like an object.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Emancipation) ->Only by abolishing slavery and fighting against it everywhere we see it can we become worthy of transcendence.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Emancipation) ->The very concept of slavery, of owning another human being as if it were an object, is incomprehensible to the spirits.
animistFact(tag=meme_Emancipation) ->To the spirits, slavery is not only sinful and wrong, but something that should be actively fought against in any way possible.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Emancipation) ->[itIsSaid] only by abolishing slavery and fighting against it everywhere we see it can we make the spirits truly listen to us.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Emancipation)->[itIsSaid] we will form a society in which no human owns another as if it were a mere object. Accepting and tolerant, as all insects are.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Emancipation)->These eldritch entities would love nothing more than to enslave the human race to do their bidding.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Emancipation)->Such occult knowledge will require an unshackled mind. As long as the mind is enslaved, the body can never be free.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Emancipation)->Only by working together can be bring the end of the world. We will free every shackled slave and recruit them to our cause.

introMemo(tag=meme_Emancipation)->We all know some other corporations in the Rim engage in "pseudo-illicit exploitment of human capital", so it is company policy to free these "forced employees" as soon as we can, and offer them an internship with us.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Emancipation)->These wayward creatures embody the concept of freedom that we espouse, and we'd do well to learn from them.

MemeDef.label: nationalist
MemeDef.description: Insubordination and dissent should be quenched to make space for a strong sense of nationalistic pride.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->firm
memeAdjective->oligarchic
memeAdjective->absolute
memeAdjective->uncompromising
memeAdjective->repressive
memeAdjective->iron-fisted
memeAdjective->populist
memeLeaderNoun->supreme leader
memeLeaderNoun->caudillo
memeLeaderNoun->chairman
memeLeaderNoun->duce
memeLeaderNoun->president for life
memeLeaderAdjective->stern
memeLeaderAdjective->patriot
memeLeaderAdjective->callous
memeLeaderAdjective->harsh
memeLeaderAdjective->implacable
memeLeaderAdjective->inexorable
memeMoralist->propagandist
memeMoralist->regime advocate
memeMoralist->campaigner
creation(tag=meme_Nationalist) ->[deity0_name] showed us that plutocratic and reactionary democracies have blocked the march and frequently plotted against the existence of the [memberNamePlural].
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Nationalist) ->[deity0_name] shouted to all the [memberNamePlural], "The hour destined by fate is sounding for us. The hour of irrevocable decision has come."
intro(tag=meme_Nationalist) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], enormous monolitic statues saluted and extolled the glory of [deity0_name].
conflict(tag=meme_Nationalist) ->A coward [foeLeader] looked at this with scorn, for [foeLeader_pronoun] was a revolutionary who didn't believe in order, justice and honor.

founderJoin(tag=meme_Nationalist) ->[deity0_name]'s truest follower [founderName], a true patriot, stood before the [place_powerCenter], and gave a long, rousing speech about how the [foeLeader] was the most powerful enemy number one against whom the [memberNamePlural] were engaged and against whom they should continue the struggle to the last drop of blood.
victory(tag=meme_Nationalist) ->Emboldened by the [founderName]'s words, [founder_possessive] troops incarcerated the [foeLeader], who was executed a few days later for [deity0_name]'s glory.
setup(tag=meme_Nationalist) ->[founderName] was a hero of the people, a true patriot. Everyone was united under [founder_possessive] banner.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_Nationalist) ->[founderName] made us understand that hardships, suffering and sacrifices that are faced with exemplary courage and dignity have their day of compensation when all the enemy forces are crushed on the battlefields by the heroism of our soldiers.

lessonIntro(tag=meme_Nationalist) ->Through you I want to speak to our people, to the authentic, real, great people, who fight with the courage of lions on land, sea and air fronts. It is so important you understand that
lesson(tag=meme_Nationalist) ->they absolutely must not be confused or contaminated by the minority or well-known, anti-social individuals and complainers, who grumble about their suspended comforts
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Nationalist) ->We are a great people. We deserve and will have victory.

archistBasis(tag=meme_Nationalist) ->Archotechs do not respect those who can't defend themselves: We rise as one unified order, under a single banner, and no enemy can destabilize the ideal we represent.
archistFact(tag=meme_Nationalist) ->Our nation will rise triumphant over the rest, proving to the archotechs that we are One people, One voice.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Nationalist) ->Only by standing proud as the only true followers of our ideals can we become worthy of transcendence.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Nationalist) ->The spirits understand the need for an unified will. The preservation of our eternal values, the suppression of which would imply instability and chaos.

animistFact(tag=meme_Nationalist) ->To the spirits, it is clear that our youth prepared itself for fight and engendered a spirit of our crusade that they derived from our soundest traditions of spiritual values and merged them with the social yearnings of our times.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Nationalist) ->[itIsSaid] only by standing proud as the only true followers of our ideals can we make the spirits truly listen to us.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Nationalist)->[itIsSaid] we will truly stand as One people, with an unified will, standing proud as the only true followers of our ideals.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Nationalist)->These eldritch entities would seek to destroy us, but they lack the vision to understand that we will stand proud against them as the only true followers of our ideals.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Nationalist)->Such occult knowledge requires an unified, iron will. We will stand proud as the only true followers of our ideals.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Nationalist)->Only our nation is strong enough to do what must be done. We will stand proud as the only true followers of our ideals, until the end.

introMemo(tag=meme_Nationalist)->As a reminder, multiple employment is expressly forbidden by the contract you signed. If you think any of your co-workers is engaging in such activities please report it as soon as possible so the proper disciplinary measures can be enacted.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Nationalist)->These wayward creatures are ours to do as we please.

MemeDef.label: healthcare
MemeDef.description: The wellbeing of our bodies and minds is something our people take very seriously. Its important that we look out for each other and tend to the wounds of our friends and family alike.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->healthy
memeAdjective->medical
memeAdjective->preventive
memeCreed->healthcare
memeCreed->wellness
memeHyphenPrefix->fit
memeConcept->hospitals
memeLeaderNoun->surgeon
memeMoralist->doctor

creation(tag=meme_Healthcare) ->[deity0_name] spoke to [deity0_possessive] followers: "Give people what they need: food, medicine, clean air, pure water, trees and grass. Don't ask who deserves it. Every human being deserves it."
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Healthcare) ->As [deity0_name] commanded, we always took care of one another and pooled our resources so no one has to suffer alone.
intro(tag=meme_Healthcare) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] built a gigantic hospital, where the ill and infirm were taken care of.
conflict(tag=meme_Healthcare) ->An evil insurance seller, seeing [foeLeader_possessive] profits evaporate due to public healthcare, wanted to sabotage the hospital by any means necessary.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Healthcare) ->Our founder, [founderName], firmly spoke to [foeLeader_objective]: "It is hard to talk about a middle ground for something that is a fundamental right".
victory(tag=meme_Healthcare) ->Eventually, everyone was convinced of [founderName_possessive] arguments, and the [memberNamePlural] will forever believe in universal healthcare.

setup(tag=meme_Healthcare) ->[founderName] was an accomplished surgeon in one of the Glitterworlds, but lost the use of his hands in a traffic accident. That's how he became Sorcerer Supreme and... wait, wrong Universe...

story(uses=1,tag=meme_Healthcare) ->[founderName] argued that health is your warranty seal. It seems quite pointless to waste health relentlessly in order to earn money that we shall spend on recovering health.

lessonIntro(tag=meme_Healthcare) ->The oldest doctor in our colony taught me the history of healthcare, how healing those who have no means to heal themselves is the basis of a free society. He was leading me to understand that
lesson(tag=meme_Healthcare) ->every single journey of your life starts with a healthy mind and a healthy journey
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Healthcare) ->You may not appreciate the presence of good health, but you will definitely regret the absence of good health, because health is happiness.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Healthcare) ->Archotechs are wise beyond measure. The values of compassion and empathy are important to them.
archistFact(tag=meme_Healthcare) ->A society that doesn't take care of those in need is a cruel mockery of civilization. How would the archotechs judge us if we didn't heal those who need it?
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Healthcare) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will allow only the most compassionate of us to transcend.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Healthcare) ->The spirits value compassion and empathy above anything else.
animistFact(tag=meme_Healthcare) ->The soul is the same in all living creatures, so it makes sense to make no distinctions when healing others.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Healthcare) ->[itIsSaid] that only those who can truly take care of anyone in need will be able to commune with the spirits.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Healthcare)->[itIsSaid] we will take care of each other like insects do. Unified in purpose, will, and compassion for each other.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Healthcare)->These eldritch entities would see us fight and quarrel among ourselves, rip each other apart. We will show them that compassion and empathy are the only goals worth pursuing.

esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Healthcare)->Such occult knowledge will require a pure mind to fathom. Through compassion and empathy towards others we will reach a state of mind that will allow us to see the cosmos for what it truly is.

eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Healthcare)->We will cherish and support each other, for we are a bastion of purity in this obscene world, and by comparison we will see the iniquity of it and why its cruel inhabitants must be purged.

introMemo(tag=meme_Healthcare)->Let me remind you that the company offers some comprehensive healthcare benefits as part of your employment contract. Feel free to peruse the details on the company's intranet and direct any enquiries to the human resources department.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Healthcare)->These wayward creatures are poor, innocent beings. We should take care of them and show compassion and empathy.
